context: People who claim that the plant is conscious and emotional often use the American Baxter experiment.Baxter connected a polygraph to the leaves of a pot of plants.The design principle of this polygraph is that people are lying At that time, due to tension, the skin will sweat, resulting in a decrease in skin resistance.By measuring changes in skin resistance, you can discern other people's emotions, and then determine whether a person is lying.Baxter reported that when the main test in the experiment thought "I want to burn off When the "leaf", the polygraph responded violently, the pointer suddenly moved to the top of the meter and showed continuous fierce fluctuations, and the polygraph drew a pattern similar to that that would appear when people were in extreme fear.Baxter claimed from this: Plants are emotional.

context: According to China ’s inheritance law, the legal succession in the first order is: spouse, child, parent, and the legal successors in the second order are: siblings, step-parents, and grandparents.After the legal succession begins, the successors in the first order inherit, Heirs in the second order do not inherit.Those who do not inherit in the first order shall be inherited by the heirs in the second order.Several people who have inheritance relationship with each other died in the same event.If the time of death cannot be determined, it is presumed that there is no death before the heirs.Each of the deceased has an heir.If several deceased persons have different identities, the elder is presumed to die first; if the deceased have the same generation, it is presumed that they will die at the same time without inheritance from each other, and their respective heirs will inherit.

context: Researchers compared the changes in the bones of people who have lived in Europe over the past 33,000 years and found that from the Middle Stone Age 10,000 years ago to the Roman Empire 2000 years ago, the strength of both human leg bones continued to decline, but compared with the strength of the upper arm bones not related to running and walking remained stable.It was also during this period that agriculture began to rise and humans gradually shifted to a settled lifestyle.The rise of agriculture caused the bones of modern people to become lighter, but the strength of the two types of leg bones thereafter With little change, the researchers concluded that the effects of mechanization and urbanization on bone strength were not significant.

context: Most people's diet contains excess fat.The fat in food is mainly in the form of triglycerides.In the digestive tract, fatty acids are hydrolyzed and released by lipase before they can be absorbed into the blood and re-synthesize triglycerides.If lipase is inhibited, this synthesis can be terminated.Some researchers have performed experiments on this.They divided female mice of equal weight into three groups, the first group fed freely and the second group fed a high-fat diet.The third group was fed a high-fat diet but added a "tea saponin" extracted from the tea.It was found that from the 5th week to the end of the 10th week, the weight of the second group of mice was It is significantly higher than the first group, but there is no significant difference between the third group and the first group.Therefore, the researchers have concluded that the "natural product" of tea saponin has the ability to inhibit lipase.Drinking tea does produce weight loss.
Answer: D.The differences between mice and humans are still very large, and the conclusions of the mouse experiments have only a certain reference for humans.

context: The rocks on the earth can be divided into igneous rocks, sedimentary rocks, and metamorphic rocks.Igneous rocks condensed by silicate slurry constitute the main body of the crust, which is the most calculated by volume and weight.But the most common on the ground are sedimentary rocks.After the earlier formation of the rock was destroyed, it was deposited on the concave surface of the earth after physical or chemical action.After compaction, the cement hardened again.It formed a rock with layered structural characteristics.In the crust, it is much higher than the surface.Under the influence of temperature and pressure, the structure, structure or chemical composition of rocks changes, forming metamorphic rocks different from igneous rocks and sedimentary rocks.
Answer: B.Structural characteristics

context: Real historical facts and the basis of historical materials are the basic elements of historical narrative.The task of history is not only to examine historical facts, but also to completely restore the features of historical figures, historical events, and historical processes.For this, historical researchers need All kinds of historical facts are connected and combined, and scholars who advocate postmodernist historical theory believe that historical researchers can make different connections and combinations of historical facts without violating disciplinary norms.These different connections and The combination will form the historical face of different characters, events or processes.

context: Without lightning, mankind would lose a hard-working "cleaner".When lightning strikes, part of the oxygen in the atmosphere is excited into ozone, and the thin ozone is not only odorless, but also absorbs most of the cosmic rays, making the surface of the earth Organisms are not harmed by excessive ultraviolet radiation.The high temperature generated during the lightning process can also kill more than 90% of bacteria and microorganisms in the atmosphere, making the air more pure and fresh and pleasant.

context: In translation, "literal translation" focuses on the faithfulness of the original text, and "parallel translation" focuses on the smoothness of the translation tone.Which translation method is the best, people have their own opinions.In my opinion, there should be no faithfulness between the literal translation and the free translation Translation must be able to express the meaning of the original text as much as possible.Thoughts and feelings are consistent with the language, which changes with each other.There is only one precise statement for one meaning, and the meaning is completely different.So if you want to express the original meaning as much as possible, you must try to keep the original sentence structured.Therefore, a literal translation must not be a free translation, and free translation cannot be a free translation.

Answer: D.Consider yourself for others during the game

context: Scientists in France and Belgium are trying to find out whether the mathematical genius is different from the brain of ordinary people.In a published report, they said that the study found that someone can mentally solve complex mathematical problems quickly, probably because they can use brain parts that others cannot use.Researchers used positron ray scanning technology to compare the brain of a famous mathematician with the brain of ordinary people.They found that when mathematicians perform problem calculations, the part of the brain usually responsible for long-term memory also becomes active, and Most people do not have this phenomenon.Therefore, researchers have concluded that mathematicians use more memory when performing calculations, which speeds up calculations.This principle is the same as the principle of computers.The larger the memory, the faster the calculation speed.
Answer: D.Faster calculations because more memory is used

context: Tropical forests showing the diversity of nature are the last habitats of many animals, and their existence is extremely important to humans.Faced with the severe destruction of tropical forests, it is easy to forget that most of the forests in temperate regions have already encountered Passed: In developed areas, a large number of virgin forests have disappeared; in development areas, especially in areas of severe rainfall, once the plants on those hillsides are washed out, it will cause problems such as floods and soil collapse.It can withstand local felling and survive, but some species have a narrow distribution range.Excessive felling will make it disappear forever.
Answer: A.Call for attention and strengthening of the protection of temperate forests

context: Some people say that all knowledge is scientific, and all science is colorless, and when we are pursuing knowledge, we must know that there is no color attitude.If this statement is not expanded at will, I also agree.But we must know that as long as To be a living person, there must be color.The pursuit of colorless knowledge must lurk with a power of color behind it or at the bottom.This driving force not only determines the direction of a person's pursuit of knowledge and The outcome also determines whether a person is sincere to knowledge.
Answer: D.Hobbies

context: Most of the ancient Chinese scientific works are empirical summaries, not theoretical discussions.The inventions described are designed to solve practical problems in national and social life, rather than trying to achieve major breakthroughs in a certain research field.In terms of research methods, Chinese science and technology attaches importance to comprehensive and holistic research, rather than grasping things as a whole, rather than separating research objects from the intricate connections, independently studying their entities and attributes, and exploring their mysteries in detail.Science and technology in ancient China did not develop to a higher level.
Answer: C.The focus of scientific research in ancient China and its historical background

context: Ancient Greece and Rome were the cradles of Western civilization.Western philosophy, aesthetics, and various art forms began here.Western music culture also began.This period revealed the relationship between music and mathematics; the three famous tragedies Escuros, Euripides, and Sophocles were both dramatists and musicians, and music played a wonderful role in their plays.
Answer: B.Close ties to other arts and sciences

context: Traditional animal resource protection measures are mainly delineating protected areas or establishing conservation bases.These measures can well protect species diversity, but there are also some shortcomings: the area of the protected area is large, and poaching is repeatedly banned; establishment of good breeding bases for protection Local breeds have large investment and long time, and are prone to inbreeding, species decline and other phenomena.The advent of new achievements in biotechnology, such as test tubes, cloning, and cryopreservation, has opened up new ways for the protection and utilization of animal genetic resources."Ark" is no longer heaven and earth.
Answer: C.Advances in biotechnology have opened up new horizons for the protection of animal resources

context: Today, with the rapid development of science and technology, people's material, spiritual and cultural needs are increasing day by day.Small-scale, low-level science popularization activities have not adapted to the development of the times."Understanding science", a large "science popularization", has become an urgent need for all Major issues of social concern.With the in-depth development of science and technology, science and technology have gradually formed their own concepts and logical systems, and they have gradually disappeared from the public's sight and common sense.It is difficult for people to accurately understand the knowledge structure and experience of the past.It is difficult to judge the social value and significance of science and its various changes, which has made some science and technology become knowledge barriers that lie on the road of human development.
Answer: C.Modern science and technology may become barriers to knowledge

context: Thousands of years ago, in the hot and humid virgin forests of Africa, the indigenous people used fire to sing freely and enthusiastically while following various complicated rhythms.This kind of singing may not be considered by some "civilized people".Music.However, such a sound is the most primitive, the sound of life issued by a tenacious instinct in a harsh environment.If blues music is the root of many musics, then the above is the root of this source.
Answer: B.Origin and relationship between blues music and indigenous music

context: Once a small advertising lightbox can kill about 350,000 insects a year.Bright nights can seriously affect the life cycle of insects, especially adults.Insects are an important part of the food chain in nature.Many small animals, birds and bats Insects are the main food, and many plants rely on insects for pollination.If the types and numbers of insects change, the ecological environment will be seriously affected.The pressure of excessive lighting on energy waste and environmental pollution is self-evident.
Answer: D.The important role of insects in nature

context: Some people say that the rules of the economic field and the moral field are different.The economic field emphasizes the role of "economic man" and the principle of doing more and more profit; while the moral field requires dedication, altruism, mutual assistance, etc.It is true that there are rules of supply and demand signals, equivalent exchange, clear property rights, and profit maximization in the economic field, but since it is a social activity of people, moral principles will also penetrate into it every moment, and it is difficult to clearly separate the two.
Answer: B.Sociality is a common attribute of the economic and moral fields

context: Compared with hard power, soft power is more of an influence, a kind of spirituality.The soft power of a city is the outside world s appeal to the city, its intuitive response and imprint of the mind.Identity and attachment are the reflections of the wisdom and feelings of city managers.The combination of soft power and hard power constitutes the overall strength of a city, and the addition of the two is not constant.Soft power directly affects the performance of hard power.Strength is like a rope, and hard strength is like a pile of hard dry wood.Although the rope is soft, it can tightly bind the hard dry wood to form huge energy that can forge a beautiful city.
Answer: B.Connotation and importance of urban soft power

context: Since the reform and opening-up, China's economy has maintained a high-speed growth trend overall, but the growth of labor employment has been much lower than the rate of economic growth.At present, although the proportion of China's service industry absorbing labor employment has been rising, it has even become an employment The main force, and basically digested all the newly added labor force, including the labor force stock transferred from agriculture and manufacturing, but compared to developed countries, its contribution to labor employment is still too low.We must use the industrial structure Opportunities for adjustments and changes in growth models to tap the huge potential of the service industry for economic development and employment expansion.
Answer: A.Industrial structure adjustment is an important opportunity for the rapid development of China's service industry

context: The taboo is to show the awe of the feudal monarchs and lords, and we must avoid saying their names directly and express them in other ways, it is the product of the feudal patriarchal system and the embodiment of the family and the respect of the ancestors.In the Western Zhou Dynasty, complete in the Qin and Han dynasties, prevailed in the Tang and Song dynasties, and reached the extreme during the Qianlong Reign in the Yongzheng period of the Qing Dynasty.Taboos, as peculiar to the feudal society, are now extinct.The taboo has evolved into some custom of avoiding evil, and its impact in real life still exists.
Answer: A.The development of feudal society makes taboos more and more strict

context: In Ankole, the Hima people who live on livestock and the Iru people who live on agriculture live together; in Arizona, the Navajo people used to hunt and gather for their livelihoods, but now they mainly live on livestock.The Hoppies are neighbors; the former southeastern coast of Australia was home to indigenous people who hunted and looted food, but now they live in Europe engaged in agriculture, animal husbandry and industry.
Answer: D.Geographical environment is not a determinant of human production

context: Philosophy used to be a way of life.The so-called Socratic philosophy is not just a way to talk to others, and the various theories he put forward in the dialogue.Philosophy was not a written study from the beginning, but a way of living.But we have forgotten this later and turned it into a difficult game far from every day.Even the rigid Kant in the eyes of many people, Don't forget to distinguish between "philosophy of college significance" and "philosophy of WTO significance", and the latter is respected.
Answer: C.Kant and Socrates' philosophies

context: Processing technology is considered to be the core technology of traditional Chinese medicine and it is also a traditional skill unique to traditional Chinese medicine.Mastering it is equivalent to mastering the traditional Chinese medicine market.Foreign companies usually hire domestic processing experts to "steal" processing technology by opening film processing plants in China.At present, there are dozens of such foreign-funded enterprises.This is because some local governments do not understand the state's regulations in special fields and cannot manage them; while some local governments know these regulations, but for economic indicators, they do not care about this.Regardless, surveys show that the number of actual domestic manufacturers of decoction pieces is several hundred more than that announced by the State Drug Administration.
Answer: A.The state should strengthen the management of the confidentiality of processing technology

context: The World Memory Project is a continuation of the World Heritage Project.The World Heritage Project was initiated by UNESCO in 1972, 20 years earlier than the World Memory Project, and it focuses on cultural and cultural values of outstanding significance and universal value in natural and artificial environments.Natural heritage, such as buildings or sites with historical, aesthetic, archeological, scientific, and anthropological research value, while World Memory Engineering focuses on documentary heritage, specifically precious documents in any medium maintained by manuscripts, libraries and archives And oral history.
Answer: C.Physical and Record

context: The area of floating ice in the Arctic waters has gradually decreased, reducing the total by about 20%, making it difficult for polar bears to stand on the ice for a long time.In addition, some countries have hunted seals in large numbers.It is difficult to hunt seals on ice floes.When we arrived at a bay near 80 degrees north latitude on the northwest coast of the island of Spitzbergen in the Arctic, we were surprised to shoot the entire process of polar bear fishing.The habit of living and "no water" began to jump out of the icy seawater to catch fish for food.
Answer: B.Natural selection, the survival of the fittest

context: Science fiction master Arthur Clark said: "If a respected old scientist says that this thing is possible" then he may be right, but if he says "something is impossible" then he may be very wrong.
Answer: C.The future may be far beyond imagination

context: One professor divided the students into several groups, sent each group some jigsaw pieces, and timed to see which group could be completed first.In fact, the numbers are marked on the back of each puzzle in order, and only need to be stitched in the order of these numbers You can spell the whole picture very quickly, but very few groups notice this.Some spells a long time before they find the digital mark on the back, and some never see it at all.
Answer: C.Opportunities only for those who are prepared

context: The survey shows that the sales volume of children's books in 2007 increased by nearly 25% year-on-year, becoming another high-growth module after economic management, academic and cultural books.In the national book retail market in 2007, children's books accounted for 11% Above; the sales of local original children's literary works are even more explosive, and they often occupy at least half of the seats on the best-selling list of children's books in major bookstores.
Answer: D.Best-selling children's literature tends to be original

context: The psychological mechanism of Internet addiction is relatively complicated.There are motivational factors such as need, motivation and special personality factors such as depression, loneliness, and self-control.Experts believe that people who exercise have strong self-control.(The content of the topic is missing)

context: When talking about French literature in the minds of the Chinese, the French can't help but say in a contemptuous tone: "You like La Traviata." In the eyes of the French, he likes Dumas and has some taste.After all, he has an "Earl Monte Cristo", there are "Three Musketeers", what does Xiao Zhongma have? I just wrote a social flower.French literature is the pride of the French people and plays a pivotal role in world literature.Just like "La Traviata" is obviously a disrespect for French literature."La Traviata" has become a kind of It is popular, almost a hundred years ago.At that time, it was failing to catch up with the Reform Movement of 1898, people were frustrated, and the way of improvement was not feasible.Everyone had to read a random novel.The birth of "La Traviata" in China was born actually.
Answer: D.Chinese and French literary aesthetics now differ

context: The fine volcanic ash contains silicon dioxide, and the melting point of this compound is 1100 degrees Celsius.At present, the operating temperature of the turbine engine of most aircraft is 1400 degrees Celsius.Once the volcanic ash is sucked into the interior of the engine, the silica will be adsorbed on the turbine after melting.The blades and turbines guided the blades, leading to catastrophic consequences.In 1982, two aircraft passed through the volcanic ash erupting from the Kalungong volcano in West Java, Indonesia.All eight engines of the two aircraft were stopped, ranging from 11,000 meters.After a high altitude glide to 400 meters, it restarted to make an emergency landing.
Answer: A.Volcanic ash has a serious impact on aircraft flight

context: From parchment, bamboo tube to paper, the invention of movable type printing, from Morse code, binary code to the digitization of images, the carriers of cultural products are becoming lighter, and the spread of spiritual products is becoming faster and faster.Especially the Internet Inventions and applications just broke the time and space boundaries of cultural content transmission, allowing text, video, and music to be transmitted to any corner of the earth in an instant.At the same time, with the help of new tools of technological innovation, people can more quickly Speed, producing exciting anime games, digital film, and television, mobile newspapers, online publishing, audiobooks, etc., and creating new cultural industries.
Answer: B.Scientific and technological innovation makes the potential of cultural innovation infinite

context: After the First World War, not only the natural sciences, but also the entire German academic culture showed a booming scene.Heidegger's position in the history of philosophy need not be repeated.Marx and Weber made the whole history of social science famous.Schmidt was the ultimate influence on modern constitutional government.In terms of psychology, the Gestalt School has also quietly risen.In literature, Hoptman and Thomasman, two Nobel winners, have twin stars.Remark's "No War on the Western Front" is the most famous in the last century.One of his works; drama, film and music also quickly entered the golden age, and the style became charming and diversified.Germany seems to want to lose what it lost politically and economically, and win back scientifically and culturally.For a regime that has changed cabinets many times in 14 years, such prosperity can be considered a small miracle.
Answer: B.The German government has always attached great importance to the development and progress of science and technology

context: The Internet age is an era of "excessive information and scarce attention".The essence of the contemporary economy based on the Internet is the "attention economy".In this economic form, the most important resource is attention.Attracting attention has become a very important issue.The emphasis on the economic value of attention in the Internet age is undoubtedly necessary, but if the moral evaluation and spiritual significance of attention are ignored, it will lead to a lack of humanity due to attention.Caring and minimal respect, so that someone will use the convenience and concealment of the network means to waste, pollute, and trample on others' attention through false and bad information, which is undoubtedly a serious mental injury.
Answer: B.Emphasizing how attracting attention in the Internet age is key to creating economic value

context: The first electric car was on the road as early as 1990.Although some well-known car manufacturers have launched their own pure electric concept cars in recent years, this has not shortened the distance between electric cars and real life.The reason is the research and development of electric vehicles is not just as simple as replacing the traditional engine with an electric motor, but a huge research topic.There are many problems such as battery capacity, storage capacity, stability, etc.for automotive batteries alone.In addition, replacing traditional engines with electric motors Later, body design, traditional systems, and electrical systems will have disruptive changes.To solve this series of problems, automobile manufacturers need to have strong R & D capabilities.(Center sentence)
Answer: D.The development process of electric vehicles depends on the research and development strength of manufacturers

context: The U.S.Department of Agriculture database contains various vitamin contents of common foods.Some people have calculated the data of various foods in the state of "raw" and "cooked".After removing the effect of changes in water content, we have obtained the vitamins after heating.Loss ratio.Although these data are not necessarily very accurate, they are enough to get a meaningful impression: Vitamins A.and E are not affected by temperature.The loss of food after processing into cooked food is about 10%, and the loss of vitamin C.is 16 %, While vitamin B.is the most unstable, with a loss of 26%.Other vitamins are also basically in this range.In general, after heating food to mature food, the loss of vitamins is roughly 10% to 25%.between.
Answer: D.Vitamin loss in heated food

context: Although "negative news" focuses on negative themes that reflect conflict, confrontation, and disharmony, the reporter's use of the subject matter may be expressed in different ways.Good reporters often find positive factors in negative themes, even If you can't find positive factors, you will also deal with negative factors in a constructive manner, alerting and reflecting; while lame reporters face certain negative themes, they will report with a mind-hunting attitude, making people wonder about the senses.Among the stimuli, it is difficult to obtain spiritual shock, baptism, and reflection.On the contrary, it will expand people's sense of fear and insecurity to society and cause extremely bad effects.
Answer: A.Even negative topics contain positive factors that can be tapped

context: History has proven that each round of economic crisis is accompanied by a deep technological revolution and then gradually comes out of the trough and begins to recover.It has to be acknowledged that the financial crisis has caused an unprecedented crisis in "Made in China".The direct result of this is that all regions are catching up.Industrial upgrading, but at the same time new problems have arisen.Under the habit of "grasping the big and letting the small," many people think that industrial upgrading is a matter for large enterprises and has little to do with SMEs.Obviously, this is a misunderstanding.The core driving force for industrial upgrading is technological innovation, and SMEs are the most active force in technological innovation.
Answer: C.Technology change is the best way for companies to survive the financial crisis

context: Canadian researchers surveyed 308 volunteers (198 of whom were women) with an average age of 29 in different parts of North America, and found that 50.7% of people had Internet delays and 47% of their time was not used for work, and It is used to delay work.Research shows that the delay of white-collar workers is more serious than that of blue-collar workers.White-collar workers who are hired are more serious than white-collar workers who operate freely.In the case of employment, subordinates have more serious delays than their superiors.Or it is easier to divert attention and procrastinate, while pleasant work has more direct returns and greater opportunities, which will make people motivated to complete faster.
Answer: C.Interesting work

context: An in-depth study of Western classics does not make people better or worse, nor does it make citizens more useful or harmful.The self-conversation of the soul is not a social reality in nature.The whole significance of Western classics is to make people use themselves.Loneliness.
Answer: C.Studying Western classics does not improve citizen quality

context: "I don't agree with you, but I swear to defend your right to speak", this sentence gathered together is said by French enlightenment thinker, Voltaire known as "French conscience", as an icon of defending "free speech" This sentence has been consistently promoted by European and American media and politicians to the world.What is unexpected is that after research, Voltaire did not say this sentence, which seems to be in the West s "free speech" statement.Poke a hole.A Chinese scholar who has lived in Europe and America for many years said that there are 18 types of "freedom of speech" in the United States that are not protected, and the content of the "European Convention on Human Rights" restricting free speech is twice as long as the content of free speech.
Answer: C.Absolute "free speech" does not exist in the West

context: Many of the shortcomings of literary criticism are the lack of theoretical courage.The reason why criticism is aphasia and absent is that there is no new and powerful theory and spirit that can be applied to support it, and there is nothing to say in my heart.What is healthy? Literary criticism? There are many standards.One of the most important standards is the ability to tolerate and rationally treat cultural practices that are different from their own cultural claims.
Answer: D.Healthy literary criticism must be tolerant and rational in treating different cultural claims

context: The Central Meteorological Observatory performs weather forecast, first solves the equations describing the evolution of the weather with a computer, and "calculates" the future weather.The weather forecaster analyzes the weather map, meteorological satellite and other data, and then makes the next 3-5 days based on the accumulated experience Every day at 8 am, the Central Meteorological Observatory connects to various meteorological stations to conduct weather consultations.The chief forecaster summarizes everyone's forecast opinions and makes prediction conclusions on the development and change of future weather.
Answer: C.Artificial analysis and forecast are irreplaceable in the weather forecast

context: Parents, students, and employers do not have the natural power to participate in the management of institutions, but they have the right to account for the social responsibility of higher education institutions.The popularization of higher education, diversified sources of university funding.As a result, parents, students, and employers have become institutions of higher education.Stakeholders: For parents and students, their accountability for the responsibilities of institutions of higher learning is more about whether students can obtain good learning experiences and learning experiences, and whether schools can produce graduates that meet social needs, and can According to the needs of enterprises and society, carry out applied research that directly inputs production and increases benefits.
Answer: C.The development of higher education institutions should consider the interests of parents, students and employers

context: With its gorgeous colors and beautiful dancing posture, the butterfly has won the reputation of "flying flowers" and "dance of nature".The rich colors of the butterfly wings and various patterns create this beautiful elf.Some butterflies are in When flying in the sun, the wings will flash with metallic light.Some butterfly wings can have a single color to a whole body, and there are butterfly colors that can be rich and dazzling.Some people even collected Arabic numerals 1-9 on butterfly wings and 26 English alphabets shaped patterns.
Answer: C.The butterfly is a very ornamental group of insects

context: The international promotion activities of Chinese that are currently being comprehensively expanded to all parts of the world must take into account the current status of overseas Chinese ethnic cultures, and comprehensively promote the international promotion of Chinese, promote Chinese culture to develop soft power, and support overseas Chinese culture from China.The mother of culture is born, and it is another thing to become the ethnic culture of the local society.If the former replaces the latter, it will confuse the boundaries between Chinese learning a mother tongue and learning a foreign language, and confuse and cooperate with overseas Chinese to build their own ethnic groups.The boundary between culture and the promotion of Chinese culture is not conducive to maintaining and developing the policy relationship between the Chinese and China.
Answer: D.One of the prerequisites for Chinese international promotion activities is to support overseas Chinese to build their own ethnic culture

context: Ballet, in China, has been more than a century since it was performed in the court in the late Qing Dynasty; it has also been taught for nearly a century in Russia since the 1920s in Shanghai.Ballet does have a great distance from the traditional Chinese aesthetics, but the Chinese It can be accepted smoothly, and it has never been interrupted for a century.Even in the years of the Cultural Revolution, ballet still ran on the stage and took on the role of "model".Ballet, once a culture appreciated by European courts, entered China but realized Chinalization A number of Chinese players boarded the podium of the international arena.
Answer: B.Ballet takes root in China with its unique charm

context: Poetry must not just stay on paper media.It must make full use of various platforms such as the stage, film and television, so that it can be accepted by the people and maintain long-term vitality.Many excellent poetry works are highly artistic and are moving towards the stage.In the process of film and television, the comprehension and feelings of the performers were incorporated, and the "second artistic creation" of poetry was supplemented by a variety of modern art expressions such as sound and light, which greatly enhanced the appreciation and appreciation of poetry.
Answer: B.With the help of artistic forms such as stage, film and television, poetry can maintain long-term vitality

context: Ah Q, like all the immortal literary classics, is inexhaustible.Readers of different times, different nationalities, different stages, and different educational levels interpret it from different angles and sides.Even the same reader at different stages of life will have different understandings.These different interpretations and understandings constitute a history of Ah Q's acceptance, which has no end and will never end.
Answer: A.The image of Ah Q is constantly enriching with the development of the times

context: The government's control of public risks is different from other social affairs.The biggest feature is that "decisions are made in the unknown".The existence of uncertainty makes it difficult to make decisions and implementation of risk control.In view of this, risk regulators should consider it in its entirety Scientific factors, economic factors, political factors, and legal factors, and ignoring any of them can lead to regulatory failure.
Answer: C.Variability of public risk regulation

context: In the 21st century, media events in China are frequent, and the degree and manner of media attention to events determine the attitude of the public and the development of events.What people see is no longer the event itself, but the media events after the media control.With the rise of the Internet, media events are more concentratedly represented in the form of online events.In online events, Internet users are the main body of Internet public opinion and network supervision.Their tentacles are everywhere in society, and they are constantly monitoring the actions of government and officials.
Answer: D.Network supervision is more efficient than traditional methods

context: When the Japanese economy was dominating the world, many entrepreneurs flooded into the art market and sought out Western Impressionist works.Later, with the bursting of the economic bubble, the purchasing power of Japanese art plummeted.The classic works of art masters seem to be on the waves The giant wheel can still not understand it; those ordinary works are small slabs, which are vulnerable to the storm, and their owners will inevitably suffer the devastation.
Answer: A.Don't blindly follow the trend when buying art

context: Chinese TV people must face up to the fact that whether it is a mobile phone, the Internet or other mobile terminals, the real challenge to TV is not the institutions and channels of these entities, but the audience that is slowly changing under the immersion of these media environments.These audiences, they may be TV people, Internet users, or "hand-shot mobs", the television content has been out of the producer's control since the moment it was delivered to them.These audiences will get from TV shows What kind of information, fun and values, how they will interpret, derive, and transform TV programs, make TV people sleepless at night.
Answer: A.Reasons for Changes in TV Audiences

context: Some scientific experiments show that most people do not have the ability to handle multiple tasks at the same time.As long as the Internet is used, people's working memory will be severely overloaded, making it difficult for the brain's frontal lobe to concentrate on any small matter.At the same time, because neural pathways Plasticity, the more you surf the Internet, the more you train your brain to adapt to a distracted state.This is why people who are used to surfing the Internet will feel at a loss as long as they leave the Internet.The full development of the brain requires us to be able to quickly analyze all kinds of information and Be able to meditate without restraint; you must be able to meditate on the Internet and retreat to the countryside.The problem today is the ability to maintain a balance between states.
Answer: A.The Internet limits the full development of the human brain

context: In a shopping experiment, first let shoppers look at some of their favorite items or disgusting items to change their emotions, and then show some pictures of common items to let shoppers choose among them.As a result, they found that they were affected by positive emotions.Subjects under control were able to make purchasing decisions quickly, and their decisions were less likely to be changed by other reasons.
Answer: A.A good mood allows shoppers to make quick, but not changeable decisions

context: In the U.S., academia, business, administrations, and most consumers tend to believe that using milk instead of milk is a healthier option.However, the vast majority of Westerners do not like the taste of soy, so American milk has been further removed Or to cover up the soybean flavor operation, and the Chinese will feel that there is no such thing as soybean milk flavor.The preference for milk flavor and the rejection of soybean flavor are the main reasons why soybean milk is not popular in the West.In addition, the soybean milk is in the preservation process.Medium and medium milk is prone to aggregation and sinking, which also makes it difficult for soy milk to become as convenient as milk.The difficulty of preservation and the market demand are not so large, resulting in the price of soy milk in the United States is much higher than milk.
Answer: D.Point out the technical means necessary for soybean milk to enter the U.S.market

context: The famous American scholar Eaton once predicted: "We are convinced that in the near future, the highest economic interests of our country will mainly depend on the creative ingenuity of our countrymen and not on natural resources." Eaton's prediction has become a reality today.The financial crisis, the sharp rise in the prices of energy and mineral resources, the risk of stagnation in the world economy, and the ability of the people to innovate has received unprecedented attention in many countries.
Answer: D.National quality will determine the direction of the country's future development

context: An enterprise in the information age is like a complete person, with organizations like bones, funds like blood, and information like nerves.Information flow is the lifeline, information systems are the nervous system, and customer needs are the source of stimulation.Under a unified digital nervous system, from decision-making to manager to executor, from human to machine, if the information can go all the way, the entire enterprise can think with one brain.This digital brain must not only respond to diverse and personalized customer needs in a timely and accurate manner.In addition, in the screening and analysis of such information resources, we are constantly looking for new opportunities, expanding the space for progress, and creating seamless service brands that are always close to customer needs.
Answer: D.Information systems are vital to the business

context: The upper leaves of sugar beets grow vertically and the leaf clusters are funnel-shaped.The foliar space preparation structure formed by this growth method is extremely effective at absorbing light and improving the photosynthetic efficiency of plants and groups.The leaves of plantain are round The angle of the leaves is 137.5 degrees, which is the chord angle of the round golden section.The leaves grow at this angle to make full use of the light.As the trunk grows, the leaves rise in a logarithmic spiral, and each leaf Neither will obscure the underlying leaves.
Answer: D.The absorption of light affects the growth angle of the leaves

context: Throughout the history of the world's pop music, you will find that it is basically a history of the integration of two different cultures, black and white, and always the original material provided by the black people, and then the white people "stolen" it and perfected it.A brand new product was launched in the world.Jamaica became the biggest beneficiary of this integration due to its special geographical location.This model was also logically extended to the field of track and field, and finally achieved the glory of Jamaica's track and field.
Answer: B.Benefits of cultural integration for Jamaica

context: At present, China is at a critical stage of industrial structure adjustment.In the current world economic crisis, the sustainability of our existing foreign trade-led economic model is becoming less and less, and agriculture is a safe haven for the economic crisis.The comprehensive agricultural production capacity and the competitiveness of the food market can comprehensively increase farmers' income, promote the large-scale development of the rural economy and the large-scale upgrade of the rural market demand, and then we can comprehensively expand domestic demand and promote the smooth transition of China's foreign-oriented economy to an inward-oriented economy.
Answer: D.The policy of strengthening agriculture and benefiting farmers is an inevitable requirement for the current transformation of China's economic development model

context: The law of world tea production is "South Red North Green", that is, lower latitude regions (such as India, Kenya) can only produce high-quality black tea, and relatively high latitude regions (25 㠾 30 㠮orth latitude) are most suitable for producing high-quality green tea.The international tea price has always been higher than that of black tea.The main tea producing countries of India, Indonesia, and Sri Lanka are not of high quality.The three countries mentioned above have been "red to green" since the 1970s, and all attempts to occupy the international green tea market have failed.At the end of the day, China's famous green tea is mainly distributed in mountain areas, with rich rural labor resources and low labor costs, and the development of the green tea industry has obvious comparative advantages.
Answer: D.The trend of "red to green" appears in the international tea market

context: Throughout the history of the currency development of various countries, although currency internationalization brings certain risks to the host country, it is far below the benefits.From the perspective of ordinary people, the high degree of internationalization of national currencies means that they are going abroad.In the process of travel, consumption, and studying abroad, it can be more convenient to pay in local currency without having to go through tedious exchange procedures.From the perspective of the government, international currency issuers can finance their international deficits by issuing national currencies, compared to other The benefits of the "mint tax" imposed by the country are self-evident.As a result, the currencies of many countries are "rivaling" towards internationalization.
Answer: B.Explain the results of currency internationalization

context: In previous foreign communications and exchanges, our diplomats often encountered situations where foreigners were discouraged in the face of China's vast and intricate cultural history, and we could not even describe the profound changes in the ancient times.Civilization, the strategic frameworks and slogans we proposed, such as "Peace Rise" and "Harmonious World", focus more on foreign strategic decision makers than on ordinary foreigners who do not know much about China.Measured by the standards of image management, our "advertising words" and "symbols" are not too close to the masses.In terms of visual touch and emotional imagination, people still feel a bit regrettable.
Answer: A.Dilemma encountered by diplomats in their diplomatic relations

context: The text we follow today about ancient Chinese painting comes from the hands of Chinese literati.It is also because of this that Chinese literati have long dominated the space for painting and sound painting discussions.They have been used to starting from their own point of view and choosing Favorable views of literati artists, and now-or long overdue-it is time for us to challenge them, and we should also question what they call good painters or good works.Many outstanding non-literati artists are because of Literati's prejudices that have failed to obtain due recognition.Here, we should give them an objective evaluation and due status one by one.
Answer: C.Scholars have long been in a strong position in the field of Chinese painting theory

context: Generally speaking, a society's supervision system is composed of multiple forces, and media supervision should not become the main force among them, let alone stand out from the crowd, because this system should also include public supervision, system supervision, and other aspects.The absence of any aspect will make the entire system appear obvious loopholes.Simply relying on a supervision force is "unsafe" for any society, because the role of different supervision forces in the entire system is Different from the system supervision and other methods, media supervision is a kind of non-mandatory supervision, which is not only subject to the environment of public opinion, but the effectiveness of supervision depends to a large extent on the attitude of the target of supervision."Hope" is pinned on the media, neither scientific nor realistic
Answer: A.Excessive expectations are currently given to media surveillance

context: Civilization and culture are different.Civilization makes all nations more and more similar everywhere.According to the German Elias "Process of Civilization", civilization is a group society where everyone lives according to the same rules, as if Dancing according to a beat, it is not the same as stepping on the feet; and culture makes a nation different from other nations.It is innate, not a rule but a habit.In fact, urbanization can also be seen in this way: the rapid development of cities, skyscrapers The building becomes a symbol of the city, which is actually the result of the strong development of modern civilization in all corners of the world.However, we also hope that civilization will not overwhelm culture and "identity" will not eliminate "difference".
Answer: C.Emphasize the need to preserve culture in the process of urbanization

context: Due to the limited scale and small strength of SMEs, whether it is technological innovation or market expansion, it is neither possible nor economical for many things to rely on each enterprise alone.Therefore, the development of associations and service organizations for SMEs Development is very important.Such organizations can be comprehensive or professional.Facts have shown that there is a great correlation between the development of SMEs and the development of such service organizations.Actively grant and support The development and operation of this type of organization is a matter of SMEs.Although it will take a certain amount of energy and pay a certain price, this kind of pay and price is worth it.
Answer: B.SMEs should be aware of the significance of participating in associations and service organizations

context: Some herbal teas that have been declared as "clearing heat and igniting a fire" are actually not even distant relatives of tea.They are not ordinary "tea leaves" but only contain some Chinese herbal medicine extracts.From the perspective of modern medicine, many symptoms of the human body are related to traditional Chinese medicine.The words "hot" and "fire" are similar, and many of these symptoms will naturally diminish.No matter whether you drink herbal tea or white water, they will be relieved after a period of time.On the other hand, it is entirely possible that there are certain ingredients in Chinese herbal medicine.It is just effective for some symptoms, so many people drink herbal tea, feel clear "hot", "fire", this is not surprising.However, such an "effective" is in line with the public's way of thinking, whoever doubts These effective remarks will attract a large number of consumers' "appearance" attacks, and it will become a matter of course.
Answer: A.Drinking herbal tea may ignore health

context: Now movie creations are reusing the popular subject matter to re-use a subject matter.There is a market, and many people are rushing up.This is not a healthy movie ecology.In contrast, the mining of national culture is rare, such as the traditional festival Dragon Boat Festival.The development of the background such as the Mid-Autumn Festival and the use of ethnic art elements such as Kunqu opera and Huangmei opera are rare.Once you deliberately explore this cultural wealth of the Chinese nation, you will be presented with a wonderful treasure trove of art in front of the creators.There will also be a spring full of flowers.
Answer: C.Domestic movies can't fall into the misunderstanding of theme reuse

context: Facing the current complex international and domestic situation, China's future industrial development will gradually show two major grasps.One is to adapt to the trend of demand structure change and accelerate the technological transformation of traditional industries.The second is to scientifically judge the future market demand changes and technology development trends.Accelerate the development of strategic emerging industries.The current global economic competitive landscape is undergoing profound changes, and scientific and technological development is breeding new revolutionary breakthroughs.The development of strategic emerging industries has become a major issue for major countries in the world to seize the commanding heights of the new round of economic and technological development strategy.
Answer: B.China should seize the commanding heights of the new round of economic and technological development

context: Just like insect bites can cause itching, contact with skin and plant toxins can also cause itching.Studies on itching from oak leaves have found that when contacted with plant toxins, skin cells release histamine that causes redness and itching.Antihistamines such as diphenhydramine can treat this kind of itching, but there are no suitable drugs to treat itching caused by allergic eczema, etc.For the latter, the best advice is to wear loose clothing in any situation Do not scratch it with your hands.
Answer: D.Reducing skin friction helps inhibit histamine activity

context: In a highly technological age where both the environment and the economy are facing challenges, it is vital to improving our ability to understand and discern scientific evidence and scientific perspectives, and one of the ways to do this is from natural sciences and The cooperation of professionals in different fields of humanities and social sciences.For example, for complex problems such as global climate change, scientists need to explore and explain the root causes, but at the same time, humanities and social science workers also need to assess the impact of climate change on population and society, journalists need to pass this information to the general public, and with their joint efforts, they can make new scientific discoveries and their socially relevant links to The public explained better and clearer.
Answer: C.Ways to improve public understanding of science

context: Many people advocate freedom of speech, thinking that freedom of speech can solve the problem of freedom of thought.In fact, freedom of expression does not necessarily lead to freedom of thought.If we observe some expressions on the Internet media, we will find that there is a kind of trend, rigorous people may not necessarily participate in expression and discussion, and there are many irrational cases of abuse and malicious attacks on the coal body of the Internet.As a result, although free speech, one's thought expression is easily vulnerable to siege This is not freedom of thought, it's just freedom of speech.
Answer: D.Freedom of speech does not necessarily lead to freedom of thought

context: Haze weather caused by fine particles is even more harmful to human health than sandstorms.Particles with a particle size of more than 10 microns will be blocked out of the human nose; particles with a particle size between 2.5 and 10 microns, It can enter the upper respiratory tract, but part of it can be excreted through sputum, etc., and it will also be blocked by the villi inside the nasal cavity, which is relatively less harmful to human health.Interfering with the gas exchange in the lungs, causing diseases including asthma, bronchitis, and cardiovascular disease.These particles also enter the blood, where harmful gases, heavy metals, etc.are dissolved in the blood, which is more harmful to human health.
Answer: A.Heavy metals will be dissolved in the blood and endanger human health

context: The so-called national media literacy refers to the literacy of citizens to correctly judge the value, meaning, and role of media information and to effectively use and disseminate information.In the information age, national media literacy has become an important part of national comprehensive literacy.As a media audience, nationals If you have a high level of media literacy, you can distinguish the various ideologies and values behind the mass media, deceive the truth of the information received, and extract the truth from the rough so that you can uphold and promote healthy and progressive concepts and culture, and resist and criticize negative and decadent concepts and culture.
Answer: B.Significance of improving national media literacy

context: When astronauts perform missions outside the International Space Station, compounds in space will stick to their clothes: they are brought back to the space station, and the smell of the universe is on these special compounds, so they "smell" the universe The real smell: Outer space smells like the smell of a car race, mixed with the smell of hot metal, diesel and barbecue.These smell: If the byproducts of the violent burning of the stars that are about to die out, this byproduct is A strong-smelling compound, polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons, these molecules flood the entire universe and will float forever.Comets, meteors and space dust all have their presence, and they were also one of the important ingredients when the life of the earth was first formed, Coal, oil, and even food on the earth have not been able to lack it.
Answer: B.PAHs are the foundation for the continuation and evolution of life on Earth

context: The dual-track system is an institutional arrangement adopted by China in transitioning from a planned economy to a market economy.It has been widely used in various economic fields.So far, the market for all industrial products and most agricultural products in China has been fully liberalized.Degrees still exist, which reflects the complexity and particularity of the reform of the food distribution system.
Answer: A.The timing of the complete withdrawal of the dual-track system under a market economy is still immature

context: Recently, researchers have developed a new type of lithium battery, which is widely used in laptops, mobile phones and other electronic products.Traditional lithium batteries use liquid electrolytes.A polymer film is used to separate the positive and negative electrodes.In the lithium battery, the positive and negative electrodes of the battery are fused together to make a jelly-like gel.This gel looks solid, but 70% of it is a liquid electrolyte, which can work well.To the conductive effect.The new lithium battery has the same function as the traditional lithium battery, and the outstanding advantages are in terms of safety.The traditional lithium battery, such as the poor packaging process, has a relatively high risk of fire and explosion.Compared with the new lithium battery using a gel, It will be much safer.
Answer: D.The internal structure of the two types of lithium batteries is different, but the conductive principle is the same

context: Since the 1990s, the global annual consumption of rare earth has increased from 33,000 tons to more than 10-liter tons.Rare earth is not only an important raw material for traditional industries such as steel, non-ferrous metals, petroleum, but also in photoelectric information, catalytic equivalent technology, and new materials.It has shown an irreplaceable role in the field.In today's world, a new use of rare earth is found almost every 3 to 5 years, and one out of every four new technologies is related to rare earth.China is the largest resource country of rare earth and protects Rare earth resources are urgently needed.
Answer: D.Development and utilization of rare earth restrict high-tech applications

context: In the process of urbanization, large public facilities or buildings, such as subways, often carry the function of urban memory and are part of the city's history and culture.Large public buildings in cities do not need to keep up with the trend and do not need to be unified, but To connect architecture with the city's historical context, human environment, etc., to a certain extent, a brand new look has become the dominant pursuit of urban aesthetics, so the city is in various unnecessary innovations and changes, and the characteristics of urban architecture are blurred.Sometimes it becomes a victim of "dressing contests", and over time, it makes it difficult to form and continue the cultural connotation of the city.
Answer: D.History and humanities should not be used in urban construction: important elements to ignore

context: The leader of the British Conservative Party personally solicited young people in the advertisement.The Labour Party has a National Committee for the Youth Labour Party.In its revised party constitution in 2005, it was stated that the young people should resonate with the Labour Party's ideas and ideas; the Liberal Democratic Party even relaxed its age, even 12 All children can join their youth organizations.This has also promoted the younger trend of party leaders and brought vitality to British politics; former Labour Prime Minister Blair took office at the age of 44 and current Prime Minister Cameron became the Conservative at 39 leaders.
Answer: A.Britain has a good culture and environment that encourages childcare

context: In all life on Earth at present, humans are no longer members of the traditional food chain, but are creating or even controlling the food chain and exerting unprecedented influence on the natural ecosystem.The abuse of atomic weapons and genetically modified technology is to make the earth s life system on which we live depends on the destruction of fire, and the garbage created by the pursuit of a hedonic consumption model will cover the planet.It also overdraws the underground resources, space resources and even space resources of future generations.The increasing temperature of the earth has attracted people Proud technological civilization sounded the alarm.
Answer: D.Technological advancements have changed the way of life of human beings, with serious consequences

context: There are advanced and backward examination techniques, but it is difficult to say that the college admissions system is advanced or backward.In 1993, scholars pointed out that the examination system is related to the national education systems and social conditions of each country.Some countries have an examination system with It is highly persistent and difficult to change; in some countries, the examination system is undergoing substantial, even rapid reforms.In addition, the reform directions of examination systems in different countries are not the same.
Answer: B.College admissions systems have their strengths and weaknesses, making it difficult to distinguish between good and bad

context: If criticism is not free, then praise is meaningless.In a sense, the credibility of praise depends on the freedom of criticism.If we are in an environment where we cannot express our opinions freely, then regardless of the voice of praise How well expressed is not to let the public believe it is true, because the most authentic evaluation is always produced in a freely contestable speech environment.Once the institutional soil that guarantees the credibility of praise speech is missing, even if the praise really comes from the parties The true feelings will be greatly reduced.
Answer: D.Being able to express criticism freely has true praise

context: It is often thought that used, old-style television picture tubes (cathode-ray tubes) are a waste material that contains toxic substances.But a new study suggests that this waste material may be useful.Researchers at 800 trillion becquerels of radioactivity Debris of the cathode ray tube glass was placed between the cobalt radiation source and the instrument for measuring the radiation dose to determine its ability to shield the radiation.The analysis results show that even if the glass debris of the cathode ray tube is not processed, the 55 cm thick Glass shards can reduce the radiation dose to 1% of the original, which is equivalent to the shielding ability of a lead plate about 9 cm thick, and lead is considered to be the substance that has the strongest ability to absorb and shield nuclear radiation so far.Debris and glass frit produced by crushing the cathode ray tube are mixed together, and the effect is about 40 cm thick.
Answer: A.The ability to absorb nuclear radiation is comparable to lead

context: After nearly 200 years of development, the art museum has evolved from the original "artist's institution" to today's "public art institution." The curator, director, and curator of the Art Museum found that the biggest problem they face now is not Dealing with donors, collectors, and colleagues, but how to attract ordinary people without art education and lack of relevant art experience to the art museum.The potential idea group does not enter the museum because they do not understand art history, lack For related art experiences, the museum has always thought that the museum did not welcome them, and there was nothing in them that interested them.Eliminating this "uncomfortableness" first required to downplay the elite color of the art museum.Art is not only about big people, but also ordinary people.Sociologically, the latter is more important.
Answer: C: Art museums should actively approach the general public

context: Government functions and costs have been controversial, but research in this area seems to be in a state where opinions and positions are far from being consistent.One important reason is the limitation of research perspectives and methods.Generally speaking, there are two types of research One is to abide by the presuppositions of neo-classical economic theory, that the market can effectively solve problems in economic and social development, and hold the view of "small government"; the other is to abide by the presuppositions of government interventionism, that the government's intervention from time to time Necessary conditions for healthy operation.I believe that to solve this dilemma, we must have a new theoretical perspective and new research methods, and the emerging classical economic theory is one of them.
Answer: A.Theoretical framework and research methods of emerging classical economy

context: Traditional holidays have statutory holidays, and it may not be impossible to travel to Zhejiang.The real reason why an ancient festival continues is not that it is so lively and how many business opportunities it can bring, but because it carries the accumulated Chinese generations.That sentiment is filled with the spiritual blood and cultural genes that the Chinese nation depends on to survive.Nowadays, as social progress and economic development, people have higher expectations and requirements for traditional festivals and look forward to returning.
Answer: D.Traditional festivals can provide people with emotional retreat and spiritual homes

context: Since the 1980s, market-oriented reforms have enabled the realization of the market value of human capital, and the rate of return on education for residents has increased from a low level to about 10%.Important reasons: With the improvement of education, high-education workers are no longer scarce, education returns have gradually stabilized, and the salary ratio of high- and low-education workers has no longer rise.In recent years, the phenomenon of wage convergence has appeared, and the gap between different education incomes is narrowing.
Answer: B.Educational level has improved, and the salary ratio of different education has decreased steadily

context: The latest research shows that the so-called "good cholesterol" may not be really that good.The study cited a large number of genetic data and found that even if the high-density protein cholesterol (HD.L) level commonly known as "good cholesterol" is increased, it will not reduce the risk of heart disease.It must help; at the same time, people with high HD.L levels due to genetic factors are not at least as likely to have a heart attack than people with low levels of natural HD.L.If HD.L really helps To reduce the risk of heart disease, the former should have a lower chance of developing heart disease.Scholars who have not participated in the study are disturbed by the relevant results.
Answer: C.Effects of cholesterol on heart disease

context: There is something wrong with the human electoral system, which is filled with too much money and meaningless arguments.Perhaps we should turn our attention to nature, find the meaning of elections, and correct or improve our system.Entomologist Tom Sealy Suggest that we should learn from bees.Sealy's research shows that the hive is a truly democratic society.When bees need to find a new home, the choice of place is voted by many bees, such as according to the size, humidity and surrounding flowers of the place How many parameters such as "quality".Each bee uses dance to vote.When the number of bees dancing a certain dance is enough, most opinions also tend to the place represented by the dance.The bees not only vote to decide "move the capital", in In the duel of the candidate queens, the worker bees will also interfere with the direction of the "election" in some way, and choose the queen who is most beneficial to the development of the entire hive.
Answer: D.Human role models

context: Unless otherwise specified, inflation is generally the price increase measured by the consumer price index (C.PI).Index, which directly affects the real purchasing power of residents 'income.From the perspective of maintaining residents' welfare, no price index is more suitable and more considerate than C.PI.And the fluctuation of food prices dominates consumer prices in China.The index fluctuates, not only because food prices account for more than 30% of the commodity basket, but more importantly, the food price itself fluctuates violently.Therefore, focusing on food price fluctuations has become the top priority of China's inflation research.
Answer: C.Explain how food price volatility affects the consumer price index

context: In traditional Chinese concepts, the sculpture has not been regarded as an art form equivalent to painting; in traditional Chinese scholarship, there is only "painting" instead of "sculpture." This lack of attention in history caused the end of the 19th century.At the beginning of the 20th century, a large number of stone carvings with high historical data research value were lost overseas, and today, the eyes of emerging collectors are only on the wealth of art, so the bronze, golden Buddha statues of the Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties Prices soared all the way, and in the face of those ancient stone sculptures that truly reflected the Chinese sculpture culture and historical style, they behaved a bit timid and indecisive, which made people regrettable.
Answer: D.The deviation between the price and value of sculpture collections

context: Deep in the heart of almost everyone, there is a longing for Utopia and the ideal society.The dystopian theme is the deduction of its logic.Eventually, it will be found that ideals (mainly worship of institutions and technology) often lead to various inefficiencies.Disadvantages of control: totalitarian rule, inhuman society, spiritual depression, etc.Compared with the enthusiasm of utopia for criticizing "old" or promised "new", dystopian vocabulary is grimmer and respects the truth of human nature.Most dystopian works are full of imagination and black humor, and their spicy irony makes us cried and laughed, and then sweated coldly.
Answer: B.Introduce the characteristics of dystopian works

context: The United Kingdom has a tradition of high welfare.In 1601, the United Kingdom introduced the world's first "Poverty Alleviation Act".In 1948, according to the "Beveridge Plan", it was declared the world's first welfare state and promised to provide a "cradle to grave" all-weather welfare guarantee.Institutional services.However, with the economic downturn, especially the aging population, the UK s population aged 65 and over has reached 16%, and pensions are inadequate.The current pension gap has reached 26% of GD.P.Reform is reasonable and reasonable, but this has undoubtedly touched the cheese of national pension costs, and it is also reasonable to be strongly resisted.Obviously, the rigid characteristics of the welfare system make it easy to be extravagant and difficult to be extravagant.
Answer: A.Describe the difficult situation in the UK pension reform plan

context: People who silently read TV news and advertisements can remember and remember more information than those who watch the TV program itself; you despise the value principle of a magazine, and you can still read it with interest.If this happens to a TV program, If you don't see it, change the channel quickly.In this case, we are unwilling to spend time on disagreeing views, it is impossible to reflect, and in fact, it will be rarer to question everything.Looking at the two written records together, it is easy to find inconsistencies, and even to discern the difference in the level of authority between the information; it is more troublesome to compare two video reports, and it is required to choose from two conflicting television reports.At times, viewers either rely on intuition or watch what they believed before.
Answer: C.Television can lead to wrong values

context: In the long evolutionary process, food scarcity has always been the primary threat to human beings.Due to the uncertainty of food supply and the inability to preserve food for a long time, human beings have been living a full and hungry life and can maximize the effective use of food Of individuals have survival advantages.After experiencing repeated famine selections, individuals with survival advantages and the genes in their bodies are retained by natural selection.These genes can stimulate a large amount of insulin secretion after a full meal, thereby maximizing Limit the conversion and use of glucose in the blood.Although the cost of doing so may lead to obesity, the survival threat caused by its harm to the body is not manifested until after middle age, and for most of human history Here, the average life expectancy of a person is less than 30 years.
Answer: B.The human physiological structure is the result of natural selection

context: As a visual symbol of mass communication, a trademark must have a specific meaning, and it needs to clearly convey the specific information it has in a concise image.Therefore, a trademark that has only image beauty but does not have rich connotation cannot be said As a "sign", at best it is only a pattern or graphic.At the same time, we must also understand that every enterprise must have many aspects.It is impossible to cover all the information with one image.It is also not advisable to accommodate all the characteristics.This requires the designer to extract the unique attributes of the object through analysis and screening, so that it perfectly integrates with the visual image, so as to create a brand-new, clearly indicative symbol.
Answer: D.Rich content is the most basic requirement for trademarks

context: Asian countries have escaped the global depression in recent years.The main reason is that they have not been involved in the 2008 financial crisis.However, a recent survey showed that Asian debt levels are growing at a terrible rate.In some ways, There are some reasonable reasons for this.The ultra-low interest rate policies of many countries encourage loans, and debt growth is a natural product of wealth growth.But it is worthwhile to note that Asian countries need to rely on larger debt scales to maintain economic growth.This signal shows that the economic health of Asia is not as good as the growth rate of GD.P reflects.Asia s current debt level is generally lower than that of Europe and is still in a safe range, but the rapid growth of debt will make the economy more vulnerable Shock.
Answer: B.Asian countries need to be alert to falling into a debt crisis

context: Meteorological conditions and changes not only affect people's physical health but also have a significant impact on psychological emotions.Favorable meteorological conditions make people feel more emotional and comfortable; unfavorable weather conditions make people feel depressed, lazy and weak and even cause psychological and spiritual Morbidity and abnormal behavior.Studies show that high temperatures, high humidity, rain and some abnormal weather events are not good for people's mental health.According to a WHO data, El Ni?o in the last century affected about 100,000 people worldwide.Depression, the incidence of mental illness increased by 8%.The reason is that this phenomenon causes global climate anomalies and weather disasters, exceeding the psychological tolerance of some people, leading to mental disorders such as restlessness, mental retardation and other mental disorders.
Answer: A.Abnormal weather can adversely affect a person's mental condition

context: You must have heard this theory: the left-handed person's right brain is more active and therefore more emotional and artistically gifted; the right-handed person has fully trained his left brain because rain is good at logical thinking and his personality is more rational.This concept is so Be so deeply rooted that some parents or educators take pains to get their children to balance left and right-hand activities.
Answer: D.There may not be a clear division of labor between left and right brains

context: Compared with government public relations, civil diplomacy is more flexible, the content and carrier of communication are more acceptable, and it can achieve the effect of moisturizing and silent.At present, more and more foreign people come to visit China, and China is getting more and more With more citizens going abroad, the development of online media has also made it easier for the general public to influence public opinion.Therefore, it is necessary to guide the domestic public to actively cooperate with public diplomacy and actively disseminate Chinese cultural traditions and values through channels such as news media, community organizations, and civil society.Philosophy, safeguard the image of the country.
Answer: D.The media should guide the public correctly in international exchanges
