context: Income distribution is the result of a series of socio-political and economic policies and related systems, so the essence of reforming income distribution is to reform socio-political and economic policies and related systems that cause unfair income distribution.Income distribution reform, in a strict sense, It is not a reform of "all the rich and poor", but a reform that brings the socio-political and economic system closer to fairness, justice and justice, and a reform of the socio-political and economic environment that provides all members of the society with more equal opportunities for development.Social fairness, justice and justice.With a political and economic system that can provide equal opportunities for development for members of society, it is possible to form a reasonable income distribution system.
Answer: A.The essence of income distribution reform

context: The role of contingency in psychology is often overlooked by laymen and even clinical psychology practitioners.It is difficult to realize that part of the change in behavior is caused by random factors, so psychologists should not pretend to be able to predict each case.Action.Psychological predictions should be probabilistic, meaning that they can make psychological predictions at the individual level, which is a common mistake made by clinical psychologists.
Answer: D.Clinical psychologists are better at making psychological predictions about individuals

context: The custom of burning incense has a long history in China.Usually people incense their clothes for etiquette.Ancient scholars also like to burn a furnace in the study to create a mood of "red sleeves and fragrance for night reading".Therefore, it was long before the Han Dynasty.Incense burners made of pottery, porcelain, copper, iron, and tiles appeared.During the Han Dynasty, the introduction of Buddhism played a significant role in the development of incense burners.From the end of the Yuan Dynasty to the beginning of the Ming, incense burners made of other materials gradually It was replaced by a copper incense burner, and the Xuande period of the Ming Dynasty was the peak period of copper incense burner production.
Answer: C.Development and evolution of incense burner making materials

context: The "happiness" sensor is placed on the surface of the human body or implanted in the human body, and the indicators of people's happiness can be measured through various indicators.No "happiness" sensor will be perfect, and it is not necessary.When the thermometer was invented It is also very imprecise, but over time, the design of thermometers has become more sophisticated and is now an indispensable commodity.Scientists believe that "happiness" sensors will follow a similar evolutionary process, although they will There will always be a certain degree of uncertainty, but wearable sensors are more low-key and easier to use than traditional tools for measuring happiness.
Answer: B."Happiness" sensor will become an indispensable commodity

context: Through remote sensing detection, it was found that from October to March of the following year, every 2 to 3 days, there was floating dust blowing from the westerly belt at an altitude of more than 2 kilometers.When it arrived over the North China Plain, due to the lowered terrain.After the wind speed drops, the floating dust will be mixed down with the pollutants, and the fine particles will rapidly increase after encountering water vapor, causing a large-scale high-intensity pollution phenomenon.If the south side is relatively strong, it will form a continuous multi-day Heavy polluted weather.
Answer: B.Formation process

context: In fact, deferred debt repayment does not help to truly resolve the risk of local government debt.In most cases, it has planted a more powerful "time bomb".Once "borrowing the old with the new" has become a routine practice for local governments The consequences are even more unimaginable.In view of this, the central government should promptly take tough measures to stop local governments from continuing to sing "drag words"; relevant ministries and commissions should also actively consider using the capital market to digest local government public debt and use debt securitization, etc.Introduce private capital to reduce debt risks; local governments should also appropriately reduce their economic construction functions, realize financial rights and equal rights of affairs, and fundamentally eliminate the living soil of excessive debt.
Answer: D.Describe the general practice of local government debt repayment

context: In the West, football was once synonymous with humility and brutality.At that time, there were no rules for football activities, let alone etiquette, and there was no difference between fighting with a group fight.It is common to kill people.But this game is particularly bloody.Particularly exciting and attractive.Although repeatedly banned, it is often "spring breeze blows up." In order to make this game that people love and hate to benefit the body and mind, and to change the image of "cheap kicker", people Created football rules, added football etiquette.
Answer: C.Football has a history of being spurned

context: In a long traditional agricultural society, mankind has been unable to shake off the lack of production and the lack of basic materials, and the total wealth of society is relatively constant, and wealth is mainly provided by limited natural resources.This means that international relations are more focused on Access to limited natural resources began.However, the development of modern industry and commerce and the advancement of science and technology have led to explosive growth in the total wealth of society.Countries around the world have increasingly realized that jointly establishing a just and reasonable world order is the realization of everyone.The best way to benefit.
Answer: B.Changes in the way social wealth is acquired have profound implications for international relations

context: In the face of earthquakes, science still has a lot to do.Through the study of seismic waves, people have found that seismic waves include longitudinal waves and shear waves.The former propagate faster, but the destructive force is smaller, while the latter is the opposite.Therefore, people use the earthquake monitoring network to monitor When the faster-propagating longitudinal wave of the seismic wave is transmitted, the monitoring center sends a signal to the monitoring center, and the monitoring center can use radio waves to send alerts to the public and key facilities through the client.In other words, the seismic alert is a "running race between radio waves and seismic transverse waves" "When the earthquake transverse wave has not yet arrived, warn people.
Answer: A.Difficulty in monitoring S-waves of seismic waves than P-waves

context: Solving the problem of combining science and technology with the economy has always been the core of the reform of the science and technology system.Previous reforms have adopted a series of measures from the commercialization of technology, the operation mechanism of science and technology, the organizational structure, and the personnel system, mainly focusing on the micro-organizational level.To this day, we need to think more from the macro-management level.In other words, the reform has been changed to the government managers who promote the reform of the science and technology system.Does the concept of government science and technology resource allocation need to change? Do we need to change the mode of scientific and technological activity management? Does the organization that manages science and technology activities need to be adjusted? After answering these three questions, it is possible to solve the "two skins" problem of technology and economy.
Answer: A.Thinking about the reform of the science and technology system from the perspective of government management

context: Since the beginning of the 21st century, Europe has been plagued by a decline in competitiveness.In 2010, in the newly-promulgated "European 2020 Strategy", the European Union explicitly proposed that the ratio of R & D and innovation to GDP would average 3% per year.Under the impact of the debt crisis, countries are busy tightening their finances, and innovation has been ignored.According to the latest statistics from the European Union, in 2011, the EU s R & D expenditure accounted for only 2.03% of GDP.Of the 27 member states, only Denmark and Malta have achieved their goals.In the next few years, due to restrictions on public debt and fiscal compacts, fiscal policies in EU countries will remain tight overall, and limited funds can be used to stimulate research and development, which means that it is difficult to innovate.The improvement has fundamentally determined that Europe's economic growth will lack an engine.
Answer: D.Economic growth cannot drive higher product quality

context: At present, there is no shortage of good design and talents in China.However, there are still many obstacles in how to integrate with life and the market to make design an industry.One is the lack of channels for communication between artists and manufacturers.Many experts believe that manufacturers lack interest in design.Many experts believe that the modern understanding of design should be extended to all enterprises, so that companies are willing to invest, only to understand that design is the main capital of future competition and is the product of international measurement The main criterion is that consumers buy the main weights in the balance so that companies can have a strategic vision that values design.
Answer: A.Enterprise's disregard for design hinders the industrialization of design in China

context: At different times, about 7,000 plants and hundreds of animals were used as food by humans.The loss of species will reduce the diversity of food, and make humans rely on only a few major foods, thus breaking the balanced diet structure of people In addition, with forests, the loss of species in the field can lead to an increase in certain pathogens, which are the culprits of disease in organisms.Some of the animals, plants and microorganisms most likely to become extinct are actually "buffers" for the spread of infectious diseases.Areas, they bear many diseases before they become infected.
Answer: B.Loss of biological diversity affects human health

context: WiFi relies on invisible radio wave transmission, the power of the equipment is getting higher and higher, and local electromagnetic radiation is bound to increase; wireless signals pass through walls, and network information is not secure.These security risks are "swept away" in LiFi.Spectral ratio The radio spectrum is 10,000 times larger, which means greater bandwidth and higher speed, and the network setup requires almost no new infrastructure.LiFi technology itself has its limitations.If the lights are blocked, the network signal will be cut off.Currently, A series of key technology products are "hands-on" by researchers, and there are no commercial chipsets yet.There is still a long way to go for thousands of households like WiFi.
Answer: A.LiFi technology is dedicated to transmitting signals with the help of lights

context: When we are suffering from some psychological pain-such as loneliness, social isolation, self-doubt, negative emotions, and no sense of life, nostalgia can play a coping mechanism.These troubles make the brain begin to screen its own memory bank and conclude Some narrative-specific snippets.Through nostalgia, we have resurfaced past successful experiences and intimate relationships.At those times, our lives have a sense of security and order.The psychologist explained: "You are reiterating to yourself 'I have done great things', and I hope this sentence can predict future development.' Although I am not sure now, looking at my past, I know that I am a lovely person.I was destined to accomplish something great.'"
Answer: A.Nostalgia will make our escape from reality

context: Clay appears to be a poorly fertile mixture of multiple minerals, but it may be the origin of life on Earth.In the simulation of ancient seawater, clay formed hydrogels-made up of a large amount of absorbable liquid The tiny space composition (like a sponge).In the past billions of years, the chemicals that have been trapped in these spaces may have undergone complex reactions, resulting in the formation of proteins, DNA.and various systems that eventually produce living cells.The hydrogel formed by clay may play a role of restraint and protection for the above chemical processes until the development of a cell membrane that envelops living cells.
Answer: D.Earth life may have originated from clay

context: In recent years, the music curriculum in China's primary and secondary schools has not received enough attention in many regions, and the content of teaching materials cannot keep up with the times.Some music teachers only focus on skills development and ignore the main purpose of music education.Before teaching students a piece of music, teachers should first understand the moral ideas expressed in it, and then educate the students' minds and bodies positively in a variety of ways.As a music teacher, it is their responsibility to make children truly love music.A true, good, and beautiful healthy seed are planted in their hearts.
Answer: A.Music education should focus on the moral education of works

context: Regarding actor certification, everyone is most familiar with the title "first-level actor", and the main criterion for the selection of "the first-level actor" is "to make outstanding contributions to the prosperity of China's literary and artistic career".The standard itself is also ambiguous.According to relevant data, it is only customary to call "first-level actors" as "national first-level actors", and the word "national" in front of the title is more a display of glory.It can also be understood that the popularity and popularity of an actor mainly come from his work, and has nothing to do with his title.
Answer: D.Realistic problems with current actor certification

context: At present, the setting of urban management institutions in different cities is different, generally divided into four types: urban construction supervision brigade, urban management bureau, urban management administrative law enforcement bureau, and urban management committee.Since urban management work is actually its own politics, there is no special national law For guidance, local governments have formulated some local regulations in accordance with the legislative authority, but they are very different and difficult to systematize.This has led to a number of "urban law enforcement violence" incidents in various places in recent years, affecting social stability.
Answer: D.It is necessary to formulate national urban management regulations

context: The so-called "commercialization of environmental resources" is to give nature economic value and incorporate the environment into the market economy system.The environment is transformed into a product that can be analyzed like other commodities.As long as the environment is given appropriate value in economic reform, the environment will It can be better protected.According to this view, the emergence of various ecological and environmental problems is precisely due to the fact that the resources and environment are not considered as "commodities" and are not brought to the market for trading.
Answer: D.Commercialization of environmental resources can better protect the environment

context: Language users distributed in different places have accumulated common or unique experiences in production and life in the long-term development process.These experiences or knowledge systems are all condensed in the language.Each language group has a different understanding of nature.The aspects have reached different depths, forming a complementary distribution of the cognitive structure, and together they constitute a broad and deep knowledge system for human beings.
Answer: B.Human groups develop and use experience and knowledge through language

context: If the Antarctic ecological environment can be assessed and the relevant regulations are strictly implemented, the ecological impact of Antarctic tourism can be effectively controlled, because compared with the extremely vast area of ​​the Antarctic continent, the area of ​​tourist activities is only the total area About 3% .How to manage the scientific research station that has been set up in Antarctica for a long time is a more difficult problem, especially some abandoned scientific research stations have caused new threats to the Antarctic ecological environment.
Answer: C.The necessity of Antarctic ecological environment management mechanism

context: With the deepening of China's opening up to the outside world and the acceleration of the globalization of the world economy, the impact of international economic environmental factors on the stability of China's macroeconomic operation has become greater and greater, and we need to pay close attention and treat them with caution.At present, the international market oil prices, food and edible oil prices The impact of rising prices on China's domestic market is becoming greater and greater, and it has become a factor that cannot be ignored for the rise of domestic market-related commodity prices.The impact of such input-type cost-driven price increases will be accompanied by China's important resources such as foreign oil The rise in the dependence of sex goods, and becoming more and more, may become a long-term factor driving price increases, and we must pay more attention to this.
Answer: B.China's externally dependent economic model is one of the reasons for rising prices

context: In the US movie theater line, whether it is blockbuster or low-cost production, the fare is the same.This does not seem to be in line with the economic theory of "demand size determines the price".Some researchers have pointed out that any theater The price of all movies released during the same period is the same, a phenomenon formed in the 1970s.Not only the film industry, sports events and performances also follow this pattern.Although at some times and in some regions, mobile pricing can enable Film companies and theaters have higher earnings, but for theaters, keeping the same ticket price for different movies still outweighs the disadvantages.
Answer: D.Formation of fares in other industries such as sports events and performances

context: "Micro-innovation", this concept is becoming a new direction for Chinese companies to try.Today's technological innovation is no longer a subversive update, and any small change to the user experience may explode the entire market.Weibo It can be seen as a micro-innovation based on blogs, which lowered the user threshold with 140 words and quickly triggered a wave of national microblogs.For companies accustomed to imitation, how to prevent micro-innovation from becoming a "cottage" "Synonym" is the key to the problem, especially in the Internet field.A phenomenon like a group of peaks is common, but it is difficult to see that "micro innovation" is playing a role.
Answer: D.Collective purchase agreement

context: When the night is quiet and we are about to go to sleep, our bodies often twitch suddenly.This kind of twitch is often referred to by scientists as lethargic nystagmus (also known as sleep twitch).At present there is no research to fully understand its cause, so There is a lot of speculation about this.One explanation is that the human brain evolved based on the reptile's brain, so it still retains part of the reptile's stress response pattern.When the muscles are completely relaxed, the brain will be based on this stress The reaction mode thinks that we are falling freely.For the sake of self-protection, the brain commands the muscles of the whole body to move immediately, trying to catch something during the fall, so the already relaxed muscles will suddenly tighten, causing sleep twitching.
Answer: D.Explain the significance of lethargy muscles for humans

context: In 1996, brain science researchers in Parma, Italy discovered that a special type of cell, called a mirror neuron, exists in the monkey's brain.Let the monkey see or hear an action.When it does this action, these cells will Excitement.Later studies have shown that this mirror neuron also exists in the human brain, which can feel the subject's fear and anger, sadness and nausea; complex feelings such as shyness, loneliness, and unpopularity can also be apparent through mirror neurons When we see other people's expressions or experienced emotional states, mirror neurons will be activated, allowing us to experience the feelings of others and enter the emotional world of others.
Answer: C.New discoveries in brain science

context: Iron is an essential nutrient for all organisms, and marine phytoplankton must extract iron from seawater.Iron produced in seawater is usually very small, so for the vast ocean area, the limitation of iron limits the growth of phytoplankton Iron in seawater mainly comes from aerosols in rivers.However, most of these iron-containing aerosols are deposited in offshore areas, so the transportation of wind and dust has become the main form of iron supply in oceans far from the continent, especially for less iron.In areas such as high latitudes, this replenishment can greatly promote the growth of phytoplankton.
Answer: C.Iron-bearing materials transported by wind and dust are important to marine phytoplankton

context: The ultra-fine particle function preparation machine is to pulverize the particles ultra-finely with a violent collision of high-speed air flow, and then automatically classify them, and then add nano- or micro-materials that need to be compounded to knead a variety of properties, so that the particles can achieve the required function.After using ultra-fine particle function preparation machine to pulverize chemicals, they are still easy to agglomerate, not easy to fluidize, and the drug is easy to volatilize.At this time, a pharmaceutical-grade surface coating compound is added, which is adsorbed on the ultra-high-speed medicine by high-speed rotation.The surface of fine particles can not only prevent the agglomeration of ultrafine particles, but also form a protective film to protect the efficacy.
Answer: C.Design principle and application in medicine crushing and preparation

context: According to reports, the female audience accounts for nearly 2/3 of the core audience of a parent-child program of a satellite TV.You can imagine such a scene: at night, young mothers with young children alone watch "Dad with children" on TV at home, And young dads may still be working overtime, socializing, or just staying in the bedroom playing games and playing computers-their children still continue the story of being without their father.In fact, this phenomenon also happens to mothers.In many modern families, the responsibility of raising children is mainly passed on to the older generation.
Answer: C.The real reason for the current parent-child show to resonate

context: The traditional concept of innovation believes that innovation does not have a fixed structure and does not follow rules and patterns.People who want to be innovators are told to "go beyond the natural thinking mode", "expand ideas and use things that have nothing to do with your products and services.Analogy ".We advocate a completely different approach: think in a well-known framework, don't jump out of its scope.When people focus on the internal factors of a situation or problem, creativity is the strongest.Defining a specific innovation task and then closing its extension, so that most of our talents may have more lasting creativity.
Answer: A.Focus is an important factor in improving creativity

context: At the beginning of the 20th century, physicists such as Planck, Ball, and others jointly created quantum mechanics, which together with relativity is considered to be the two basic pillars of modern physics.The development of quantum mechanics revolutionized the structure of matter for people.And the understanding of their interactions.With the help of quantum mechanics, many phenomena can be truly explained, new phenomena that cannot be imagined by intuition are predicted, and then verified.The birth of theories such as quantum mechanics has helped promote the progress of world civilization.It is of far-reaching significance.The scientific value of these years-long basic research results is inestimable, and it can never be measured by simple standards such as "useful or not."
Answer: D.Scientific value cannot be measured with quantitative indicators

context: News is an objective report, and comments are subjective judgments.In order to get rid of subjective assumptions and maintain objective and rational as much as possible, the news must be based on the facts of the news, rather than relying on its own imagination.This determines that reviews can always follow the news.Later, according to news facts, make corresponding comments and value judgments.You cannot run in front of the news, you cannot make judgments beyond the facts of the news, you can't piece together a fact based on fragmented imagination, and then trumpet it.
Answer: B.Comments are from news but higher than news

context: Looking back at the entire industry chain, the plight of China's milk powder industry is the plight of the upstream smallholder economy.China is at the peak of its birth, and there is a huge gap between the amount of milk powder needed and production.High-quality milk sources are scarce products, especially in pastures Today, the traditional dairy farming model has become the biggest obstacle to the development of milk powder in China.The milk source in our country cannot meet the soaring market demand.If we want to ensure the quality of milk sources, we need to change the current small farmer style.The free-range farming model has been transformed into an industrial pasture-style farming model, which requires many fundamental reforms, such as land transfer, the diversion of agricultural population, and a large amount of original capital investment, which are more difficult than restoring milk powder credit.
Answer: C.It is difficult to get rid of import dependence in a short time

context: Mark Twain once heard a pastor lecture in a church.At first he felt that the pastor was moving and prepared to donate.After ten minutes, before the pastor had finished speaking, he was a little impatient, so he decided to donate only some change.After another ten minutes, the priest had not finished speaking, so he decided not to donate a penny.In psychology, this phenomenon of excessive stimulus and prolonged action caused psychological impatience or resistance.Called the "overrun effect".The "Ice Bucket Challenge" project currently aimed at helping patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis should also be alert to this effect due to excessive entertainment.Start with the show, but not end with the show, Leaving the true spirit of charity and not just the star video collection, this transnational relay is considered a success.
Answer: C.To grasp the value of charity and entertainment

context: At present, for most consumers, smart home products are both familiar and unfamiliar, and many people's concepts are still in electric curtains or villa anti-theft systems.From a technical level, one-click control, remote control, human body sensing, automatic The products that appeared in opening these movies are not "high-tech" today, but due to reasons such as high prices, smart homes have not become widespread.
Answer: B.At present, there is no barrier to technically achieving smart homes

context: Human self-esteem can be divided into conditional self-esteem and unconditional self-esteem.The former is self-esteem obtained by meeting certain preset standards, and self-worth depends on the realization of these standards, rather than the true needs of the self, such as thinking of having Beauty is only valuable.Conditional self-esteem often does not understand their needs, and the standard for measuring self-esteem is internalized.If the love of parents is conditional, reward their desired behaviors and not want them.Punishment of behavior, which imposes standards of behavior on children.Children will unconsciously regard this standard as their own pursuit of life, and conditional self-esteem is often manifested through strong self-awareness.Such people always pass Look at yourself from the perspective of others.
Answer: D.Parents setting behavioral standards for their children are not good for their growth

context: British scientists claim that they have found a way to replace the Global Positioning System (GPS) without the need for any space technology.Studies have found that lasers can confine and cool atoms placed under vacuum, reducing the temperature to above absolute zero One millionth of a degree.At such temperatures, atoms are extremely sensitive to changes in the magnetic and gravitational fields of the earth.Researchers can use these results to limit atoms on a small device, study their fluctuations, and locate their And accurately locate where they are.At this time, the tracking of the track will be done by a device that is only 1 meter long.The key is how to turn it into a miniature device so that it can be installed on a smartphone.in.
Answer: D.The principle of using atoms to locate

context: Psychological science education is a systematic project that requires the cooperation of all parties.A district has carried out various special psychological science education activities.Streets and communities are the main positions of psychological science education, and all streets have listed this work as community education The relevant departments of the District Party Committee Organization Department, the District Human Resources and Social Security Department, the District Education Department, and the District Women's Federation carried out targeted psychological science popularization education from the actual situation, which played a positive role in stabilizing the workforce.

context: Big data refers to massive data that is so large that it is difficult to obtain, manage, process and organize it into useful information through general software tools.It has four characteristics of large volume, high speed, diversity and value, and is considered to be the new century human The "new wealth" and the value "comparable with oil", the developed countries have taken the development and utilization of big data as an important goal to win a new round of commanding heights.
Answer: C.Developed countries have taken a step forward in the development and utilization of big data

context: From politics and economy to daily life, from globalization to regional revival, from practical technology to discourse expression, many problems and even crises are closely related to the factor of space.This is caused by the earthquake and tsunami disaster, border armed conflict, The collapse of the real estate industry, road congestion and increasing competition for space are manifested in various forms.
