context: The so-called information processing viewpoint is to compare the human brain with a computer, and to treat the human brain as an information processing system similar to a computer.However, this analogy is only functional, that is, an analogy at the behavior level, regardless of its material composition.The difference between biological cells and electronic components.In other words, this analogy involves only software and not hardware.
Answer: C.Material composition

context: Wu Guanzheng said that students of both primary and secondary schools are currently nervously reviewing their homework and welcoming the final exams.Exams are necessary, but don't make it too difficult, don't make partial questions, problems, and you can't make most students fail.The burden of current students It is too heavy and is in a state of tension from day to night.It is necessary to call on the whole society to care about students, not to have too many homework assignments, and parents not to scold their children.Especially the primary and middle school students, the student enthusiasm is already very high, no longer Do nt overweight.Those who do nt get a college degree are not necessarily worse than those who get into college.There are many people who do nt study college, but they are very talented.Let students participate in some social practice activities, participate in some labor, and achieve the full development of moral, intellectual, and physical education..
Answer: A.The whole society has reached a consensus on the burden of primary and secondary school students

context: The way of thinking of modern science has undergone tremendous changes in the development of modern science, forming a new angle and new direction that is very different from modern science.It has shifted from mechanical thinking to system-oriented thinking.Holism, dynamics, complexity and contingency.
Answer: A.The way of thinking of modern science has undergone tremendous changes in the development of modern science

context: On the afternoon of April 8, when Hu Guohui and Peng Xiaoliang from Hunan Province passed by Gate 9 of Guangzhou Baiyun Airport Terminal, they picked up a white tote bag with 356,000 US dollars, equivalent to more than 2.3 million yuan.Migrant workers who were struggling with their lives were resolutely handing over their handbags to the airport police station.According to reports, after Hu Guohui and Peng Xiaoliang's indiscriminate deeds were exposed, their identities and living conditions have become hotly debated and wanting to know Details.Many netizens speculate that these two people who are ignorant of gold are high-educated and high-income people.In short, the subtext of this sentence seems to be: "Only high-quality talents will not be jealous of this flying windfall, only high income.Only groups can resist the temptation of huge sums of money."
Answer: D.Labeled Interpretation

context: Monkey heard that Boss Niu asked for a tutor, so he went to apply.He found Boss Niu in the paddy field, and the two sides agreed on related matters.The next day, the monkey was going to teach.Before leaving, he arched into the water.The pond was covered with muddy mud water.The mother monkey felt strange when she saw it and asked why he was so.The monkey said: "I saw the boss of the cow just like this yesterday, and probably their family just started it.Boss Niu saw the dirty appearance of the monkey, and was displeased, and yelled at him to leave.The monkey asked in amazement: "Did you not do that yesterday?" Boss Niu closed the door and replied scornfully: "My Working in a paddy field! ".
Answer: B.In-depth investigations can better serve the masses

context: Open the circle of friends, dine on food, dazzle on the beautiful scenery, and dazzle on a variety of tans.No matter how busy you are, you will never forget to take photos, which makes these complicated or simple links extra steps.In all aspects, I spent a lot of time unknowingly and lost a lot of energy.There is such a passage: the wound bleeds, the first thing to do is not to stop the bleeding, but to take a picture and send a WeChat; when someone is in distress, it s the first time, the people who pass by first Instead of coming forward, but taking photos and sending a circle of friends; the viewer's response is not first to ask the photographer why they are bystanders, but to blindly like, good or bad, good or bad, happy or good, sad or good.Asked for help, nothing more than getting praise.
Answer: C.Fake busy in the circle of friends

context: In the process of accompanying their children, many parents will encounter the problem of their children lying or concealing the truth.Lying is almost the worst behavior that many parents are most worried about, and it even scares and annoys them than their poor academic performance.It is said that many parents do not solve the problem of children's lying well, at least they pay attention to it, and the problem of children concealing their parents from their parents is not only solved worse, but it has not received enough attention.
Answer: D.The child's concealment of his own situation has not attracted the attention of parents

context: Divorce has become a century epidemic in the 21st century.I expect that the public will see more celebrity and child divorce in the future.This is not the crow's mouth, it is the general trend.Think of the people around you and see what happens every day, It is known that the trend is inevitable.The reason is that the information revolution will change the tradition.After the industrial revolution, marital status is different from that of the agricultural society, leading to the emergence of new families and the collapse of old families.Today, this generation has caught up with a whole new era, the rain Come.
Answer: A.Today's society will usher in a higher divorce rate

context: The birth of "Flood Girl" Fu Yuanhui turned out to make Chinese people see the Chinese contemporary athletes work hard and enjoy the style of competition; "Sun Yang does not cry", let us feel the tolerance of Chinese people when they treat athletes' failure.We ca nt help but shout China People began to enjoy the Olympic Games and no longer struggled with winning or losing.But when I saw titles like "Reproduced the Spirit of the Women's Volleyball Team" and "Return of the Spiritual King of the Women's Volleyball Team", the author lamented "We only have victory or defeat in our eyes, where is the spirit".
Answer: C.Criticize the media's thinking of "heroic success or failure"

context: When I started working, I worked as a teacher in a higher vocational college.In addition to having 20 lessons a week, I also had to be a counselor.Due to the poor quality of the students, the school learning atmosphere was not ideal, and the classroom teaching was all about not learning Of students, I will have a full sense of frustration after each lesson.Every week, I really feel like the entire person has been hollowed out.Later, I resigned decisively and changed to a more preferred job.The feeling of hollowing out is gone.
Answer: C.Instead of consuming self-confidence in frustration, choose another life

context: In addition to doing things, we need to read more books, but our lives are short and we ca nt read the classics.Why read other books? What is classic? Books that have been washed through time are classics.To relax, everyone s works recognized in the intellectual world are also called classics.But not all of them are classics.It is not easy for a person to write a classic in his life.Those who can write two or three can be called Wizards.So in general, reading one's masterpiece is enough, and only a few landmark figures need to read all.
Answer: C.What to read

context: A magnitude 7.3 earthquake in Kyushu, Japan, a magnitude 7.2 earthquake in Myanmar, a magnitude 7.1 earthquake in Afghanistan, and multiple magnitude 7.0 earthquakes in the waters off the island of Sumatra in Indonesia in a month ...How to explain the recent strong earthquakes, are there any correlations between them? Has the Earth entered the seismically active period? In this regard, both Chinese and foreign experts believe that any conclusion needs to be supported by scientific evidence.However, whether it is statistical significance or specific research, it is not yet possible to determine whether the magnitude and frequency of global earthquakes are beyond the normal range, and whether there is a correlation between them.It cannot be concluded, but it is necessary to study some vigilant areas and maintain vigilance.
Answer: B.Has the Earth entered vibration mode?

context: Aunt Wang downstairs in my house is pushing her paralyzed husband for a walk every day.I used to talk and laugh before, but I have been feeling down a bit recently.When I asked, I was told that it was caused by the "open second child" policy.It turned out that the second child in Beijing The son said that the daughter-in-law was pregnant again.They planned to let the old lady take the child.The old man hired a 24-hour housekeeping service.Aunt Wang said that he could not leave his wife and wanted to help his son hire a nanny in Beijing.But the son said that Beijing was too expensive, and the babysitter was not assured of seeing the child.After one or two visits, the daughter-in-law went to the hospital for a miscarriage and died.In this way, Aunt Wang and her wife got angry and felt guilty.Blame myself for dragging down the whole family."Aunt Wang couldn't help tears and said," This body is really bad, sorry for the children."
Answer: A.The two-child policy has been liberalized, but "dare to live" is a problem

context: Have you ever thought of such a question.When you go somewhere, the return journey seems to be shorter and takes less time.Why? This is because we don't know the exact length of the mileage, but only estimate it through some other clues.When we travel to strange places, the way to go seems to be longer than the way back and forth.Because what we saw at the time was a series Fresh things.However, on the return journey, we only need to identify some road signs, rather than forming new memories.Therefore, the brain feels that the space is shortened and the time is shortened.
Answer: B.Space affects our sense of time

context: In Taipei, it is not the well-known Eslite, the chain bookstores such as Kii House, that really prop up the bookstore industry, but independent bookstores that far exceed the chain bookstores.Among these independent bookstores, there are comprehensive bookstores that operate in all directions.There are also special bookstores that specialize in books in a certain field.Take the bookstore block of the mansion as an example.Here, there are both the largest second-hand bookstore in Taiwan and old bookstores with countless rare books.The mainland bookstore of books.If there are only the above types, it is not particularly diverse, but here, there are even feminist bookstores focusing on gender theory, and theological bookstores focusing on religious theory.
Answer: B.Taipei is a city of cultural scholars

context: In the parable story of Turtle and Rabbit Race, running rabbits are negative textbooks.But among marathon runners, rabbit has a glorious role.The scientific name of rabbit is speed dating.The role in the competition is to guide the runner to run at a stable pace and complete the race within a preset time.Running is considered a lonely sport, but once it appears on the arena as a "rabbit", it can not only be considered Rather than refreshing his results, a qualified "rabbit" should instead emphasize his "presence" and pass the confidence of running the race and the stability of running to the runners who follow him.
Answer: D.Race level and continuously surpass self-limitation

context: The movie "July and Anson" tells the growth story of a pair of soul mates.In July and Ansheng, the two girls have very different personalities.They met in their youth and talked about everything.They are girlfriends, and they are another self in the soul Although they have embarked on a different path in the future, they are deeply enthusiastic about another life.The film runs through the clue of a drama: one girl is writing the story of two girls.In the end, the film is in An Sheng, who published the novel on the Internet, wrote An Sheng and July at the same time, and became a person with two selves.This story also completed the fullness of the life process and the improvement of the life texture in the fictional space of creation.
Answer: C.One's ultimate maturity is towards reconciliation with self

context: Recently, a research team published the latest research results on human embryo gene editing of HIV virus immunity.This result is based on AIDS embryo cell experiments.The human embryo genes are edited and rewritten to hope to achieve the effect of immune AIDS.The real problem is that genes Its function is not single, linear, but a network structure, which often affects the whole body.We don't know what other reactions will occur when changing one.This is likely to be beyond the control of the editors.However Gene editing technology has incomparable medical advantages in evading and treating major diseases and repairing congenital defects, and has irreplaceable positive significance.
Answer: B.Resistance, I don't know what kind of ending will lead human beings

context: Recently, some netizens expressed such concerns, "I have money in Alipay and WeChat.If I die unexpectedly someday, what will happen to the money (my family does not know the money)?" Resonated.According to the regulations of Internet companies, if personal accounts are not used for a long time, Alipay will be cancelled and WeChat will be recycled.This also means that personal online property is likely to be "forfeited".There is also such a kind in physical banks Situation.But physical banks generally have relief mechanisms.For example, for "dormant accounts", banks can contact a second contact person, or relatives and friends of the parties hold a bank card to inquire, etc.Inspired by this, current legislation should be adopted.Solve the "dormant account" problem of the network platform.
Answer: B.Emphasize the need for legislation related to online accounts

context: Ping pong, badminton, volleyball, Chinese athletes can achieve good results in all three competitions, but basketball and football are not the same.It seems quite difficult to achieve a breakthrough in the short term, especially football.Table tennis, badminton and volleyball have this Commonality: Both sides of the game have their own fixed positions, and the victory or not depends on the size of the defense ability.The players in basketball and football games run all over the field, and the victory or failure basically depends on the size of the offensive ability.The characteristics of Chinese athletes' sports capabilities reflect the characteristics of the Chinese culture behind them: they are defensive, not offensive.
Answer: A.Chinese athletes are good at defense is a reflection of national cultural characteristics

context: China s college entrance examinations are all on the ground floor, but big cities are not good, because superiority lacks motivation.The area where Hengshui Middle School is not rich, Anhui Luan Maotan Factory is the mountain lantern, Huanggang Middle School has also worked hard to create glory, these The school has a word for "spell", and all have a set of methods different from conventional ones.They push the unsophisticated children to the Himalayas, let them stand out and look at the mountains.For parents, the confusion center hurts the children.In tears, he cried and made him join the ascetic army.This is actually a portrait of the future of mankind: dyeing Cang is Cang, and dyeing is yellow is Yellow.
Answer: A.Near Zhu Zhechi, near Mo Zhehe

context: What is the actual situation of India's implementation of the "free medical care" system? According to statistics, the proportion of doctors in India is 1: 1500.The government medical system is divided into national hospitals, state (provincial) hospitals, regional hospitals, county hospitals and township hospitals.Usually government hospitals at all levels face medicine.Shortages, poor hospital conditions, inadequate ward conditions, inadequate hygiene, and a large number of doctors receiving patients, and high work pressure, and many other problems.Public hospitals are not profitable, doctors have low salaries, and doctors with good medical skills can't keep them, all went to private hospitals.The latter charges are extremely high and the bottom people cannot afford to consume.
Answer: B.India's so-called "free medical care" does not solve substantive problems

context: The "New York Times" reported that China's "non-famous common cold dish"-shoot cucumber, swept New York this summer.Some Chinese people cheered "a successful export of Chinese culture" while cheering, because there was no lack of doubt.According to media disclosure The sauce used to mix cucumbers in New York is not traditional garlic sauce, but salad dressing and yogurt.In fact, the original cultural output should be there, but it is often a niche, which can quickly open up the difference in a short time.The cultural market is destined to be the makeover of "Chinese cucumber".This "mix and match" product that not only satisfies curiosity but also adapts to daily habits, can often show extraordinary circulation and produce unexpected cultural output..
Answer: B.Cucumbers mixed with salad dressing and yogurt also belong to Chinese culture

context: The country finally issued a policy that emphasized the need to protect cultural relics.This is a good thing.After the two major shocks of revolution and construction, Chinese cultural relics are not much left.From the surface, China has become younger than the United States, and the city One is counted as one.It is even newer than New York.The buildings are all new.Reinforced concrete with enlarged glass, square streets, neon lights, every city is the same.Is there any cultural relic? Yes, they are in the museums of several central cities, in the hands of private collectors.However, the things there are no longer cultural relics, but goods that are out of a cultural background, just like Chinese cultural relics in the Metropolitan Museum of New York, just the value of viewing and auctioning.
Answer: D.Loss of cultural logistics is the pain of cultural relics protection in China

context: In 2014, the Korean drama "You from the Stars" hit the air in China, and the book "The Wonderful Journey of Edward" watched by the protagonist was sold out of stock.This kind of book-selling book is not alone.For example, in contrast to the film and television dramas in China, the most frequent scenes must be eating and meetings.Of course, literature and art are derived from life.If there is no option for reading in life, it is difficult to create editors if you have to show reading in the drama.
Answer: B.Value Orientation of Artistic Creation

context: A young man asked Jobs: Where does your wisdom come from? Jobs replied: from precise judgment.The young man asked again: Where does accurate judgment come from? Jobs replied: from the accumulation of experience.The young man asked again: where does your experience come from? Jobs answered sincerely: from countless wrong judgments.
Answer: C.Reality comes out of practice

context: Studies have shown that there are more genes related to appearance than those in other parts of the human body.Very many genes are involved in the construction of the ever-changing appearance features of facial structure, hair, eyes, and skin color.Therefore, the human face has a clear genetic characteristic.However, genetic diversity is also limited, there are only so many people.At some point, people will have the same deck of cards in your hand.
Answer: C.Genetic characteristics of the face are more pronounced within family members

context: In the 2015 film summer season, youth films have always been the highlights.The growth of youth films largely depends on the "precision delivery" of movie production to the audience.Statistics show that among the core moviegoers in China in 2014, "University undergraduate and tertiary" accounted for 81%, "Master and above" accounted for 10%, cumulatively more than 90%.It is this batch of post-80s and post-90s, which constitutes the most dynamic crowd in China.However, domestic production The quality level of the youth film and its "spring" in quantity may not match.In addition to the subsequent weak box office performance, the reputation of the youth film is also facing a decline.Whether it is from the understanding and expression of the "youth" reality, or From the emotion and logic inherent in the plot, most youth films perform poorly.
Answer: B.Youth film quality does not meet market demand

context: Recently, with the emergence of a number of highly alternative "emotional robots", making simple emotional interactions is no longer the biggest challenge in making emotional robots.The presentation of social problems such as empty nest elderly, autistic children and patients has made Vietnam more More and more businesses are optimistic about the future market of "interactive" and "accompanied" robots.However, the elderly living alone is unaccompanied, and the children are left unattended at home.They use robots to accompany the solution instead of increasing care and companionship for people.In the short term, scientists like the development of "cut-proof uniforms" to protect doctors may seem an exciting and good way, but this may cause people's emotional dislocations, social issues being disregarded, and ethics caused by further humanoid robots.Questions need to be considered in advance.
Answer: D.Questioning the use of emotional robots to solve social problems

context: Where does Beijing come from? In his new book "Beijing-The Temple of Human Civilization", Wang Guanghao used the wisdom of an old archeologist to tell us about Beijing's earth veins, human veins, city veins, cultural veins and Qi veins.The geographical characteristics of Beijing, the long prehistoric age of Beijing, the sustained development of the early civilization, the progressive expansion of the imperial capital from scratch, the formation of a unified pattern of ethnic diversity, and the continuation of the traditional belief system.
Answer: B.The ancient long distance of Beijing connections

context: Adversity can increase people's insights, improve their hearts and minds, and exercise their physique, so that a young man can take on the heavy responsibility of life and at the same time know how to enjoy life.This wealth is difficult for smooth sailors to obtain.
Answer: A.Adverse talents

context: Porcelain was originally a vulgar object, a daily necessity, originally born from pottery.After thousands of years, it finally got rid of its original rough appearance, entered the room, and became a tasteful work of art.It is still used in daily life, and has not lost its secularity because it has become a valuable art work.Secular is the thick and huge artistic foundation of porcelain.On this basis, it has gradually climbed higher and higher, and the art is endless.The beauty is endless.It can be seen that Daya is contained in the vulgar, and there is no vulgarity, but the vulgar is actually one.
Answer: A.Daily needs are the driving force for the development of porcelain art

context: Literature has the role of propaganda, but propaganda cannot replace literature; literature has the role of education, but education cannot replace literature.Literary works can produce the effect of subtleness and shape the soul, and of course they can also do bad things that corrupt the soul, but both It is inseparable from the reader's life experience and the education they receive.Experience, environment, education, etc.are all accumulated in the reader's heart.They can resist the influence of the work and help the reader understand the work.The books are all "take what you need." Only through accumulation and continuous contact can you be affected and changed unknowingly.
Answer: C.The influence of literary works is influenced by the reader's background

context: Whether it constitutes plagiarism should be judged by combining subjective motivation and objective results: subjective intentional or unintentional, and whether there is a fraudulent component; objectively, whether you profit from it, or whether it harms the original author prematurely.When people follow this The standard once again looked at the "practice" of plagiarism from ancient times to the present.What kind of behavior should be condemned by public opinion is gradually becoming clear.For example, in the field of literary creation, as early as the 17th century, Shakespeare was once trapped in the "plagiarism gate".Many sentences are similar to the works of previous generations.The vast majority of people acquiesced to Shakespeare's "plagiarism", and even unswervingly regarded it as a literary master.This is because in his time, such reference was conducive to dissemination.Knowledge benefits the public without causing substantial harm or negligible harm to the original author.
Answer: A.Sentence similarity is an important criterion for determining whether it is plagiarism

context: As private power is increasingly valued, it is increasingly common for husbands and wives to establish each other's rights and obligations in a contractual manner.Most of these agreements have common characteristics, that is, the right to identity and property are closely integrated, and often belong to property interests As the final legal consequence of the agreement, modern marriages have become so fragile, and the Shanmeng oath has made people feel insecure, and people are more inclined to maintain the security of marriages in a contractual manner to protect their property rights after the marriage breaks down.
Answer: D.Legal effect

context: After the financial crisis, many entrepreneurs in the United States have called for "return to manufacturing." The prescription for Meitu's "reindustrialization" is: Armed U.S.companies with artificial intelligence, robotics and digital manufacturing so that U.S.manufacturing can compete with China.Labor competition: China is likely to plan early to create new competitive advantages.
Answer: A.Robots challenge Made in China

context: The Octagonal Gold Cup, which is now collected in the Shaanxi Provincial Museum, is a relatively representative piece of the Tang Dynasty.It was excavated in 1970.This cup is a national first-class cultural relic, with a height of 6.4 cm, an extravagant octagonal corner, and a full circle.Between eight faces It is divided into renju-like patterns, decorated with embossed patterns such as clappers, blowpipes, and playing pipa.The figures are high-nose and deep-eyed, which is obviously the image of a western man of the time.In addition, there are honeysuckle patterns, curly grass patterns, and Decorative patterns such as mountains, birds, butterflies, etc.This cultural relic is of great help in studying social phenomena such as metal crafts, plastic arts, cultural exchanges, song and dance music, and clothing in the Tang Dynasty.
Answer: C.The Eight-sided Golden Cup was a gift from the Tang Dynasty to the Western Regions

context: A civilized society or a civilized city that values public morals and respects hygiene and courtesy cannot be established by a mass movement of "five stresses and four beauty" or the establishment of measures such as spitting fines.If every citizen does not have a sincere need, he believes that Speaking of public morals is closely related to their own interests.If there is no such consciousness of citizenship, no matter how harsh coercive means are, it will not help.
Answer: A.Building a civilized society cannot rely on coercive measures

context: An investor focused on A.City and B.City.In A.City, he was sitting on the street and rubbing his shoes.The shoeshine first untied the laces of one of his shoes and waited until he paid.It was tied up.This detail made him have to doubt the moral standards of the citizens of the city-someone must have washed his shoes and ran away without paying.In B.City, he took a taxi 5 times, before getting off, 5 The drivers all reminded: sir, please bring your belongings.In the end, he set up the business in B.City, which caused 5,000 people to find jobs, and the tax department of B.City gets hundreds of millions of dollars each year.Taxes-this is the influence of a shoe shiner and several taxi drivers.
Answer: D.Someone's inadvertent behavior affects others' important decisions

context: In Hancock Park, located in the center of Los Angeles, there is a series of asphalt pits called "La Brea Asphalt Pits".For tens of thousands of years, natural asphalt has continuously emerged from underground cracks and formed in the park.Pond.The surface of this asphalt pond is often covered with a layer of water.Animals walk in to drink water, get trapped inside, and eventually drown.Other predators see the trapped animal and try to prey, but they are also trapped inside and unable to extricate themselves.They all turned into a pile of fossils and were preserved, thus forming an animal graveyard.
Answer: C.The pond in Hancock Park is made of asphalt

context: Many people think that cancer is a "modern disease" because "I have never heard of it before".Recently, there seems to be some research to support this view.Recently, a report by the British "Daily Mail" was introduced into the country, and It has attracted a lot of people's attention: through the research of mummy, the two scientists found that the ancients were cancer-free, and cancer was "artificial modern disease", and even said that "the death rate of humans has started to soar since the Industrial Revolution." People who know it will probably find this conclusion very weird."Human mortality" has always been 100%, and why it "surges".Various carcinogenic factors in nature, such as ultraviolet rays, environmental toxins, moldy foods, carcinogenic viruses, etc.It has been in existence since ancient times, but the research described in the report is real, and related papers have been published in the latest issue of the Natural Cancer Review.
Answer: C.Cancer should be blamed on environmental pollution

context: In the age of the Internet, people have to share and communicate in the digital world because they have to prove their existence.But in fact, this desire for connection is not so much a treatment as a disease.It expresses our anxiety about the fear of loneliness, but it does not solve the problem.On the contrary, it isolates us from the outside world.At the same time, we have lost the ability to be alone.This kind of solitude can let us focus on thinking about problems, find ourselves, and When you find yourself, you can have a better connection with others.
Answer: C.Learn to be alone or you will be more lonely

context: In fact, just as the New Culture Movement cannot completely shake the strong position of Confucianism in Chinese culture, the current "injection of water" articles and the concept of Mantianfei will not completely kill the empirical spirit of Puxue in the Qing Dynasty.Great joy, nothingness, follow in the West The so-called heel manipulation of a few nouns will only produce a pile of text junk, which can neither stand for a long time, nor will it be inferior to the western academic community.On the contrary, if we do not discard our student tradition, we can do solid studies instead.Build a strong opponent in front of Westerners.
Answer: B.Floating academic atmosphere makes academic achievement difficult in China

context: A child picked up the stone and broke the window glass of the store.The child who did the wrong thing ran away, and the store owner considered himself unlucky and took out a sum of money to buy the glass and reinstall it; this time, the glass shop had a business And made a small amount of money; the owner of the glass shop used the money to buy bread at the bakery, and the bakery was working again; the owner of the bakery went to the farmer to buy a few pounds of flour ...just broke a glass, But it has led to the development of many industries in the society, and even created employment opportunities.This is really a great case of bad things becoming good things! This virtual case is exactly a famous theory in the economics-the theory of broken windows.
Answer: C.If the glass is not broken, the store owner may also actively change the glass

context: When we say that Confucianism is moral supremacy of moral determinism, it is a kind of overall qualitative and evaluation on a macro level.The so-called "Zihanyanli" or "little man is Yuli" focuses on the human being as a moral existence, Beyond the "should" nature of existence and argue, what is rejected and scorned is "injustice, rich and expensive".Specific to the issue of people's livelihood, Confucianism is not talking about benefits, negating benefits, but advocating to benefit the people.Benefit the people and enrich the people; not that morality determines people's livelihood, but that people's livelihood determines morality.
Answer: B.The Confucian view of people's livelihood is not about morality but emphasis on people

context: In contemporary China, due to the limitation of national power and the influence of traditional thinking, women have fewer opportunities and degrees of education than men, and housework and child care are mainly borne by women, which limits their mobility.Women have limited access to these major development resources It has far less possession than men, which further limits women's equal competition with men, widens the distance between them, and further expands the inequality between men and women.
Answer: A.In contemporary China, the biggest problem facing women is the further expansion of inequality between men and women.

context: The publishing medium has the function of metabolism.It is constantly changing personnel, constantly obtaining material and energy from the outside world to maintain its own survival and development.With the process of metabolism, the publishing medium has derivatives, growth, growth, aging, death In the process of development or regeneration, in the development process of the publishing medium, it is also constantly innovating (mutating) on the basis of inheritance (heredity), so that the organizational form and publishing form of the publishing medium has undergone tremendous changes.
Answer: D.Great changes have taken place in the organization of publishing media, publications, etc.

context: In recent years, with the continuous increase in the number of IT vendors, competition in the IT market has become increasingly fierce.For IT products, users must choose not only the product itself, but also the service; good service has become an important factor influencing user purchase decisions.Show: For high-tech products such as computers, users are willing to spend an additional 10% on the purchase of good-quality, homogeneous products.

context: Community commerce is the basis of urban commerce, an important carrier to meet the comprehensive consumption of residents, and accelerating the development of community commerce is an urgent requirement to improve the modernization and comprehensive competitiveness of urban commerce.Therefore, the development and improvement of commercial communities, The integration of systematicness, scientificity, and efficiency to build a modern community business network in China is an important measure to meet the daily needs of residents in the community and improve the quality of life of residents.

context: With the globalization of the world economy, marketization and information becoming an irresistible trend, the competition for cultural positions, especially youth cultural positions, is related to the rise and fall of the Chinese nation and the ruling status of the Communist Party of China.The overall situation of society and the height of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, a profound understanding of the strategic significance of strengthening the construction of youth culture, a firm grasp of the direction of advanced culture and the characteristics of the times, advancing with the times, adhere to Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory and " The important thinking of "Three Represents" guides youth culture construction.

context: In ancient China, the secrecy of official documents can be traced back to the Xia Dynasty.According to historical records, Tai Shiling has "maps" (that is, important national records and archives of the country) "official collection"; during the Shang Dynasty, the history of keeping Tibetans was established An official position, responsible for keeping official government documents and books; the Zhou Dynasty inherited the tradition of the Shang Dynasty and collected the original documents in Tianfu, the earliest central archives institution in China's history.When the Qin Dynasty, the seal was sealed on the documents and passed on.The use of "sealing mud" in the process has become a common practice.In the Eastern Han Dynasty, the "sealing mud" used for the confidentiality of office documents turned out to be a metaphor for keeping guards."Hou Han · Xiao Zhuan" records: "(王) Yuan please use Yimaru mud as the king to seal the Hangu Pass, and this will happen for a while."It means that guards should be carefully sealed, and there should be no omissions.

context: Mark Twain once heard a pastor lecture in a church.At first he felt that the pastor was moving and prepared to donate.After ten minutes, before the pastor had finished speaking, he was a little impatient, so he decided to donate only some change.After another ten minutes, the priest had not finished speaking, so he decided not to donate a penny.In psychology, this phenomenon of excessive stimulus and prolonged action caused psychological impatience or resistance.Called the "overrun effect".The "Ice Bucket Challenge" project currently aimed at helping patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis should also be alert to this effect due to excessive entertainment.Start with the show, but not end with the show, Leaving the true spirit of charity and not just the star video collection, this transnational relay is considered a success.

context: A song sung from 1988 to 2008, and sold 9 million tapes and records of a song, which was a miracle created by the Seoul Olympics song "Hand in Hand." At that time, Park Shi-chi advocated the use of world-renowned record companies to create Olympic songs.This proposal met with strong opposition.But he insisted.Multiple rounds of discussions have been inconclusive.At this time, the major record companies in the world came to knock on the door.Among them, the world's largest audio-visual multinational company Polygram launched.The conditions are very tempting.Under the combined effect of internal and external factors, the Olympic Organizing Committee finally chose Polaroid.As a compromise, the Organizing Committee also chose the local Korean combination to sing this song and put "Arirang "Into the lyrics.Finally, two versions of" Hand in Hand "were officially released.The exciting singing at the opening ceremony was precisely due to a successful" Hand in Hand "-Italian composition, American composition and Korean composition Sing.

context: A master wanted to choose a successor and ordered his apprentice to go out to pick up the most perfect leaf.Soon after, the apprentice returned and handed the master a piece of leaves that was not very beautiful, saying, "Although this leaf is not perfect, it is the most complete I have seen."The two apprentices turned outside for a long time, and eventually returned empty-handed, saying to the master," I saw a lot of leaves, but I couldn't pick out the perfect one."Finally, the master passed the mantle to There is no perfect person in the world, only a complete person.A complete person must have advantages and disadvantages.In this case, you must learn to accept your strengths and your own weaknesses; accept the advantages of others, and also accept the Disadvantages of others.In the process of acceptance and appreciation, we will get the greatest release and freedom, with a broader mind, to accommodate everyone around us.

context: The 8th Olympic Games were held in Paris in 1924.For the first time, the organizers concentrated their participants in purpose-built wooden houses.This was the earliest Olympic lining.Since the Los Angeles Olympics in 1932, Olympic villages have been provided for participants from all countries.It became a tradition.From the first modern Olympics to the end of the 20th century, the United States was the country hosting the most modern Olympics, including the 4 Summer Olympics and 3 Winter Olympics.The two world wars of the 20th century made the original plan in 1916.In 1940, the 6th, 12th and 13th Olympic Games held in 1944 were forced to be canceled.According to the old system of the ancient Olympic Games, any Olympic Games that could not be held due to some reason also ranked in the history of sports.

Answer: B.A story of making money by wisdom

context: There is a pointy grass on the African grassland, which is the tallest thatch there, but its growth process is very special.In the first half of the year, it was almost the shortest grass on the grassland, only an inch high, but after half a year of rain Once it arrived, it was like magic, after three or five days, there was a height of one meter six to two meters.It turned out that in the first six months, the spike grass was not long, but it was always in the roots, before the rainy season.Although it shows an inch, it takes root more than 28 meters underground.

context: The so-called "using the IP address or network name as the defendant" is actually only for the pre-filing procedure.In this way, the plaintiff of the network infringement can apply to the people's court to investigate the relevant information of the defendant's identity, and can verify the formal filing of the trial.From this, it can be seen that this is actually the plaintiff requesting the court to use its investigative power to find out the person behind the IP address or network name, and to transfer the power of investigation to verify the "defendant's specific identity" to the court.Without special investigative powers, most of the public also do not have the technical means to conduct online tracking.If the court still cannot find out after the intervention, it will still not be accepted.As long as there is no clear defendant, the plaintiff's lawsuit will be meaningless ----- -Not to mention that during the trial, the "defendant" could not defend, even if the plaintiff won the lawsuit, there was no responsible person to bear the corresponding civil liability.
Answer: B.Analysis of the plaintiff's disadvantaged position in online infringement cases

context: Due to the combination of heaven and earth, the inner and outer walls are all rounded forward.The main buildings are round, and the outer walls of the Qiuqiu and the outer walls of the Qi Nian Temple are square, symbolizing the place of heaven.The cypress, a green sea, eliminates all interference from the field of vision.Put yourself in the hills, look up at the heavens, look around the green earth, the solemn atmosphere, and lead to the realm of imperial power, the union of heaven and earth, and the dialogue between man and heaven.The double columns of the inside and outside of the twelve columns symbolize December and twelve hours.The ceiling is soaring, and the dragon is in awe.The cigarettes are misty and the music is loud during the sacrifice, which strengthens the reverence and belief in heaven.

context: "Unknown Lacquerware" was unearthed at the Tomb of Ruyin Houzao in the Western Han Dynasty in Fuyang, Anhui Province in 1977.It has been verified that it is the earliest existing guillema in the world with a definite date.The display, using the shadow cast by its north ear at noon, can indicate the arrival of the winter solstice, spring equinox, summer solstice, and autumn equinox.The geographic latitude of this type of table is fixed, and it has been calculated that the tomb of Ruminghou Qi The applicable latitude of the Gui watch is exactly in the area from Changan to Ruming Hou Kingdom in the Han Dynasty.The subtlety of this Gui watch is that the positions of the four solar terms are not indicated by scales, but are implicitly embedded in wooden blocks and lacquerware.Some special patterns and positions.
Answer: C.Applicable to specific geographic locations

context: The latest data shows that there are currently about 13,000 new cases of malignant melanoma in the UK each year, compared to just 1,800 in 1975.In terms of prevalence, 17 out of every 10,000 British people now have the disease The prevalence rate 40 years ago was three ten-thousandths.Malignant melanoma kills more than 2,000 people in the UK each year, making it the fifth leading cancer killer.The British Cancer Research Association believes that the increase in the prevalence of this skin cancer is related to People's lifestyles are related, such as not paying attention to sun protection, the increasing popularity of sunbathing, and the "artificial tanning" that is gradually emerging.Experts from this research society remind that people must pay attention to sun protection while enjoying the sun, and sunburn itself is in the skin cells.A hallmark of DNA damage, the long-term accumulation of this damage increases the risk of skin cancer.
Answer: B.Neglect of sun protection causes a sharp rise in skin cancer in the UK

context: Transgenic phytase gene corn is mainly used for feed processing.The contained phytase can decompose phytate phosphorus in feed and release inorganic phosphorus that can be used by animals.At the same time, it can reduce the content of phosphorus in animal manure and reduce Environmental pollution; it can also reduce the investment in plant, equipment and energy when producing phytase by industrial fermentation.Therefore, the phytase produced with corn as a carrier is directly used for feed processing, which realizes environmentally-friendly and energy-saving agriculture The dream of producing "green" phosphorus by production methods has huge industrial advantages and application prospects.
Answer: B.Using phytase gene corn processing feed is in line with the environmental protection concept of modern green agriculture

context: 17 copper coins unearthed today in Xiji County, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, located in the north section of the East Road of China's Silk Road, were identified as "Guishuang Dynasty" coins left over from the ancient Silk Road.Rising from Central Asia's slavery country, it developed into its heyday from 105 to 250 AD.It was considered to be one of the four great powers of Europe and Asia at that time.It was tied with the Han Dynasty, Rome, and rest.A type of coin with important historical value, manufactured by Greek pressing method, with a texture of gold, silver, copper and other materials.The front of the coin is often designed with the same emphasis on characters, characters and patterns, and the shape is approximately circular or oval.Dozens of Guishuang coins have been unearthed in the Hotan area.

context: For ordinary people, it's not just about how much the price has gone up or down, but to wonder if the money they have paid is unjust and reasonable.The reason why consumers are so sensitive to fluctuations in the price of resources such as electricity prices To some extent, this type of price is set by the government, and the operators are mostly state-owned monopolies.The costs are not disclosed, and the pricing is not transparent.Will the operating companies rely on monopoly status to obtain huge profits?
